texts.en:
"Trust all your actions to God’s hands and your projects will be realized." This is María Rosa’s, favorite quote. She is 58, and learned about tailoring when she was young, thanks to her aunt’s willingness to teach her. When she was well-prepared, she found a job in a small workshop, where she worked for more than ten years. She decided to quit and work independently from home, which made it possible for her to take care of her two children.

She now has a small workshop where she works with tailoring. She is requesting a loan to buy an overlock machine in order to be able to offer a better service and increase her production capacity. This will result in better income and the improvement of her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy an overlock machine.

loans.name: Los Claveles Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LOS CLAVELES”  iniciará el cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Nora es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ganado, tejido de mantas de hilo, servicio de transporte, librería, venta de material de escritorio, venta de CD’s y jugos de quinua, servicio de transporte.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Nora es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de su amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta pastelería; cuenta que este negocio lo implemento con el primer préstamo que realizó de Pro Mujer, ya que una de las asesoras le dio pautas para la apertura de este negocio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de harina y azúcar) que adquirirá de las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializara en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella vive en unión libre y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le el área de salud.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Los Claveles” (The Carnations) will begin its fourth cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Colllpani Focal Point.  It is composed of 8 members and is led by a board of directors where Nora is the President.  The businesses that the members of the communal bank carry out are varied, among them are: the sale of livestock, weaving blankets of yarn, transport services, a bookstore, the sale of office supplies, the sale of CDs and juices of quinoa.

The loan they will take out will benefit the small group of businesswomen of which Nora is a member.  She indicates that two years ago she joined Pro Mujer, entering at the invitation of her friend who is a member of the institution.  At present she has a business selling pastries.  She says that she implemented this business with the first loan made by Pro Mujer as one of the advisers gave her guidelines for the opening of this business.

The loan that she will take out now is for the increase of capital to buy wheat and sugar that she will acquire from the markets of the city of El Alto and subsequently prepare what she will sell in her sales space.  This way of working allows her to generate resources in order to maintain her home as much as possible as she lives in a common-law marriage and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the health services.

loans.use: to buy flour and sugar.

loans.name: Marleny

texts.es:
Marleny de 35 años de edad, es una mujer que se ha ganado el cariño y la admiración de muchas personas en su localidad, por su pasión y responsabilidad. Es madre soltera de dos hijos menores de edad, los cuales son la razón más importante para querer salir adelante. “no importa cuantos necesidades y pruebas he tenido que padecer, porque cuando mis hijos sonríen se que todo mi esfuerzo ha valido la pena”. Con estas palabras, Marleny confiesa las dificultades que ha tenido que afrontar en su caminar diario, pero aún sigue llena de motivos para seguir luchando. 
Con pocas oportunidades para emplearse, decidió dedicarse a  la venta de minutos de celular para ganarse la vida. Hoy desea aumentar su portafolio de servicios y por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de un local de madera y surtido que le permitirán generar mayores ingresos para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: Marleny, who is 35, has earned the affection and admiration of many people in her district on account of her passion and responsibility.  She is a single mother with two minor children who provide her main motivation to succeed.  "It does not matter what hardships and setbacks I have had to contend with because, when my children smile, I know that all my efforts have been worthwhile".  With these words, Marleny admits the difficulties she has had to face on her daily journey, but she still has plenty of reasons to keep fighting.  Due to the shortage of employment opportunities, she decided to start selling mobile phone minutes as a way of earning a living.  She now wants to extend her portfolio of services and so she is requesting a loan which she will invest in the purchase of a wooden stand and supplies which will enable her to generate additional income for the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to buy a wooden stand and supplies (snacks and sweets)

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es:
Sandra de 36 años de edad, tiene claro que con su disciplina, es posible sacar adelante a su familia, a pesar de no haber contado con la suerte de realizar estudios universitarios, con su esfuerzo a logrado forjar su propio negocio dedicado a la producción de arepas. 

Sandra es una mujer llena de sueños y hoy se encuentra en búsqueda  de ellos, el primero es mejorar y expandir la comercialización de su producto, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de una motocicleta, la cual le permitirá generar eficiencia en la entrega de sus pedidos, incrementar el número de unidades vendidas, y obtener una mayor rentabilidad.
Su mayor deseo es poder ofrecerle a su hijo de 15 años de edad, mejores oportunidades educativas.
texts.en:
Sandra, 36, is certain that it's possible to get her family ahead with her discipline.  Despite not having been lucky enough to study in the university, with her effort she has managed to build up her own business making "arepas" [corn cakes].

Sandra's a woman full of dreams, and today she's in search of them.  The first one is to improve and expand the sales of her product.  This is why she's requesting a loan to buy a motorcycle, which will allow her to be efficient in delivering her orders, in increasing the number of units sold, and in having better profitability.

Her biggest desire is to be able to give her 15-year-old child better educational opportunities.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Josefa Alejandra

texts.es:
Josefa  de 47  años de edad, originaria de Granada, viuda, madre de 6 hijos entre las edades de 14, 16, 19,  20, 21,23  años, actualmente solo tres están estudiando, y los otros tres  trabajan, de oficio comerciante, se dedica a  la venta de verduras. Inicio  en el ámbito del comercio a la edad de 23 años con la ayuda de su marido quien viajaba a los Estados Unidos  a trabajar para obtener otra forma de  ingresos extras para invertir en su negocio, debido al fallecimiento de su marido ella decidió emprender otro negocio como es la venta de nacatamales los fines de semana, ya que ella tenía que buscar un medio del cual subsistir y mantener a su familia, se siente satisfecha porque ambos negocio le generan ganancias a diarias, cuenta con clientes fijos.
Ella está requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar papas, cebolla, tomates, melón, zanahoria, remolacha, plátanos, etc. ya que ella estima que este crédito le ayudara a comprar toda la verduras que necesita para surtir el inventario de su negocio, sus planes futuros es poder pagar el crédito para luego volver a solicitar otro para seguir invirtiendo en el negocio para mantenerlo estable y rentable, una de sus metas próximas es ampliar el negocio.
texts.en:
Josefa, 47, is a native of Granada. She is a widow and mother of six children aged 14, 16, 19, 20, 21, and 23. Currently, only three attend school and the other three work. As a trader, she sells vegetables. She began in this area of trade at the age of 23 with the help of her husband who traveled to the United States to obtain extra income to invest in her business. Due to the passing away of her husband, she decided to undertake another business of selling nacatamals on the weekends. She did this since she had to look for a means to sustain and maintain her family. She feels satisfied because both business are generating income daily and they have regular customers. 

She is requesting this loan to buy potatoes, onions, tomatoes, melons, carrots, beets, bananas, etc. She estimates that this loan will help her to buy all the vegetables that she needs to stock her business' inventory. Her future plans are to be able to pay off this loan and then apply for another one to continue investing in her business to keep it stable and profitable. One of her next goals is to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, onions, tomatoes, melons, carrots, beets, bananas, etc.

loans.name: Juliana Aracelly

texts.es:
Juliana una humilde señora de 31 años de edad, originaria de Granada, soltera, de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de ropa de la que es propietaria hace más de 1 año y medio, con conocimiento académico universitaria. Inicio desde muy joven en el ámbito del comercio trabajando con su mama, la cual tenía un negocio de pulpería, pero fracaso porque no supo administrarlo bien, fue allí que ella decidió emprender su propio negocio de venta de ropa, con capital propio y dinero que le dio su mama para  mantener su negocio estable.  
En estas ocasión ella está requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar más ropa tales como blusas, faldas, vestidos, short, pantalones y sandalias, con el objetivo de agregar toda la ropa que aún  no tiene en inventario y la más solicitado por sus clientes, sus planes futuros es ampliar su negocio y establecer otro negocio solo de calzado.
texts.en:
Juliana is a humble 31 year old woman from Granada. She is single and works as a vendor. She makes a living selling clothing from her own business that she has had for more than a year and a half from her university level education. She began very young in commerce working with her mother who had a small convenience store as a business but failed because she did not know how to manage it well. It was her that decided to start her own business selling clothing, with her own capital and from money that her mother gave her to stabilize her business. 

She now needs a loan to buy more clothing including blouses, skirts, dresses, shorts, pants and sandals with the objective of adding all the clothing that she doesn't yet have in inventory and is in highest demand. Her future plan is to expand her business and establish another one only for footwear.

loans.use: to buy more clothing including blouses, skirts, dresses, shorts, pants and sandals.

loans.name: Angel Leonidas

texts.es: El sr. Ángel sigue con la misma actividad de animacion de fiestas, tiene una amplificacion, cuenta que le va muy bien con su actividad tiene ya mas contratos y esta mejorando su servicio, en esta ocacion solicita el credito para la compra de un parlante de mayor potencia.
texts.en:
Ángel continues with the same job organizing parties.  He has a sound system.  He says it's going very well for him in his job.  He has more contracts and is improving his service.

He's requesting this loan to buy a more powerful speaker.

loans.use: to buy a more powerful speaker for his sound system

loans.name: Santiago Reynaldo

texts.es: El Sr. Santiago  tiene 38 años,  tiene cuatro hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, el  se dedica  a la construcción y remodelación de viviendas, el es albañil contratista, el vive en la zona de Pampahasi,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, El Sr. Santiago  va a utilizar este préstamo para la compra de material de construcción ya que esto le permitirá realizar su trabajo de manera eficiente ya que tiene contratos que cumplir, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su trabajo, El Sr. Santiago  va a utilizar los beneficios en comprar Herramientas para su trabajo ya que las que tiene se le están gastando y necesita renovar para realizar un mejor trabajo, El Sr. Santiago  es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada  en la otorgación del crédito ya que esta es su única  actividad que le permite mantenerse.
texts.en:
Santiago, 38, has four school-age children.  He makes a living in home construction and remodeling.  He's a construction contractor.  He lives in the Pampahasi area.

This loan is Santiago's first sequence with the institution.  He's going to use it to buy construction materials, which will allow him to do his job efficiently because he has contracts to fulfill.  His reason for requesting this loan is to continue improving in his work.  Santiago's going to use the profits to buy tools for work because the ones he has are wearing out and he needs to update them to do a better job.

Santiago's a very hardworking person.  He's happy about the opportunity of being granted the loan because this is the only work that allows him to support himself.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his job

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: La Sra. Maribel tiene 29 años, tiene tres hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar,  ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan, su panadería  que se encuentra ubicado  en la zona de la Mutualista,   este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra. Maribel va a usar este préstamo para la compra de material de construcción como tejas para la construcción de un techo para el lugar donde se encuentra su horno, La Sra. Maribel es una persona  con ganas de superación se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantenerse.
texts.en:
Maribel, 29, has three school-age children.  She earns a living making and selling bread.  Her bakery is located in the La Mutualista area.

This loan is her first sequence with the institution.  Maribel's going to use it to buy building materials such as tiles to build a roof over the place where she has her oven.

Maribel is a person who wants to improve herself.  She's happy with and grateful to the institution for the financial support because this is the only job that allows her to support herself.

loans.use: to buy tile to build a roof for her oven

loans.name: María Del Rosario

texts.es:
La señora María tiene 50 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos; de los cuales solo una hija de 29 años de edad vive con ella. se dedica  a la venta de productos comestibles como son galletas, gelatinas y bebidas (jugos, gaseosas, refrescos, agua helada en bolsa o en botella, bebidas hidratantes)  todos estos productos los vende en la parada de autobuses. En este lugar tiene un puesto en la acera que la alcaldía le ha asignado. Los productos los vende en su puesto y la hija le ayuda a venderlos en los autobuses cuando estos realizan su parada en  la meta para bajar o subir a los pasajeros. Ya tiene más de 18 años de ejercer esta actividad, es una persona muy trabajadora.  
 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 10 cajas de gaseosa,
10 cajas de gaseosas, 10 bolsas de agua, 5 fardos de agua embotellada, 3 fardos de galletas, 10 bolsas de gelatinas.

La necesidad más importante será el fortalecimiento del negocio; ya que cuenta con muy poca mercadería para ofrecer al público y aumentar los inventarios para tener una reserva de todos estos productos. También el pago de una deuda a una institución financiera.  

Si se incrementan los inventarios y se compran más productos las ventas también incrementaran y el margen de ganancia será mayor. Con estos ingresos el nivel de vida será mejor ya que se podrán hacer un ahorro para el futuro. 

Sus planes a futuro según sean las ventas y ganancias, es construir un cafetín o comprar un derecho de un puesto en el mercado de la ciudad para vender los productos, para poseer un local propio este es el sueño de toda la vida que ella ha tenido.
texts.en:
María is 50 years old, she is married and has 4 children. Only one daughter, who is 29 years old, lives with her. She makes a living selling groceries like cookies, jello and drinks (juices, sodas, refreshments, frozen drinks in a bag and re-hydrating drinks). She sells her products at the bus stop, from a sales stand that was assigned to her by the mayor. She sells her products from her stand and her daughter helps her sell in the buses when they are stopped, to the passengers who are getting on or off the bus. She has been working in this way for over 18 years. She is a very hard worker. 

The loan that she is requesting through the "Fundación Campo" she will use to buy 10 boxes of soda, 10 bags of water, 3 packs of bottled water, 3 packs of cookies and 10 bags of jello. 
 
The necessity that she has, that is of highest priority is to strengthen her business. She currently has very little merchandise to offer the public. She wants to increase her inventory to have extras of all her products in reserve. She also needs to pay a debt that she has to a financial institution. 

If she increases her inventory and buys more products, her sales and her profit margin will also increase. With this income her standard of living will improve and she will be able to start a savings fund for the future. 
 
Her plans for the future are to continue selling to make a profit, to build a small restaurant or to buy rights to a stand in the city market to sell her products. To have her own sales stand has been the dream she has had her whole life.

loans.use: to buy 10 boxes of soda, 10 bags of water, 3 packs of bottled water, 3 packs of cookies and 10 boxes of jello.

loans.name: Victor Ignacio

texts.es:
Víctor de 46 años de edad, se describe como un guerrero que no se detiene ante nada, las dificultades las ve como oportunidades para aprender y mejorar. En su vida ha tenido que afrontar situaciones que lo han marcado, pero de las que ha salido Victorioso. Hoy tiene una miscelánea gracias a su esfuerzo y años de trabajo, aunque hace 4 años se vio en la obligación de cerrar su negocio debido al orden público del sector, lo cual lo obligó a marcharse para otro lugar y comenzar nuevamente con su actividad. En la actualidad su negocio se está acreditando, por esta razón, Víctor se encuentra solicitando un crédito, que invertirá en la compra de útiles escolares para la temporada estudiantil, con el propósito de aumentar sus ventas y ser competitivo en el mercado.
Su mayor sueño es poder comprar el local en donde tiene ubicado su negocio con el fin de reducir gastos y garantizarles a sus dos hijos menores de edad mejores condiciones de vida y la oportunidad de ingresar a la educación superior.
texts.en:
46-year-old Víctor describes himself as a fighter who never lets anything get in his way.  He views difficulties as opportunities to learn and improve.  Over the years, Víctor has had to face situations which have left their mark on him.  However, he has always emerged victorious.  He currently has a general store which is testament to his efforts and years of hard work.

Four years ago, Víctor was forced to close his business owing to public order problems in the neighborhood.  He was forced to move to another place and re-start his business.  His current business is gaining a good reputation and, for this reason, he is requesting a loan so that he can invest in buying school supplies for the back-to-school period.  He thereby hopes to increase his sales and be competitive.

Víctor's biggest dream is to buy premises in which to set up his business so that he can reduce his costs and guarantee his two dependent children better living conditions and the opportunity to pursue a university education.

loans.use: to buy school supplies

loans.name: Carla Lorena

texts.es: La Sra. Carla tiene 21 años, sigue con la misma actividad de elaboracion y venta de chocolates, cuenta que le va bien en su actividad, crecio en su clientela, en esta ocacion solicita el credito para la compra de insumos para la elaboracion de chocolates como cacao y manteca de cacao y azucar por mayor. ya que tiene pedidos que entregar.
texts.en: Señora Carla is 21 years old. She continues with the same business of making and selling chocolates. She relates that her business is going well for her. Her clientele has grown. She is now applying for a loan to make wholesale purchases of ingredients to make chocolates, such as cacao, cocoa butter, and sugar, since she has orders to fill.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make chocolates

loans.name: Chavelas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CHAVELAS”  iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rose Mary es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: artesanía en yeso, venta de frescos, tejido de mantas y venta de jugos, venta de ropa usada, tienda de videos, venta de café y comida, librería y papelería.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rose Mary es integrante, ella indica que hace tres años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de su madre que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de producción de artesanía en yeso; cuenta que este negocio lo aprendió de su madre, ya que ella también cuenta con este mismo negocio, posteriormente con un préstamo de Pro Mujer de nuestra institución creó su propio negocio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de estuco) que adquirirá de las los distribuidores y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializara en la feria tradicional de la alasita. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones del área de salud y crédito.
texts.en:
The "CHAVELAS" communal bank will begin their second loan with Pro Mujer, as part of the Collpani Regional Hub. The group is made up of nine members and led by a management board with Rose Mary as the President. 

The businesses that the members of the communal bank carry out are varied. Among them are: plaster handicraft, selling frescos, blanket knitting and selling juice, selling used-clothing, a video shop, selling coffee and food, a bookshop and a stationary shop.

The loan they receive will benefit small micro-businesswomen where Rose Mary is a member. She says that she has been a member of Pro Mujer for three years, joining by invitation from her mother who is an associate of the institution. At present she has a business producing plaster handicraft; she says that she learnt this business from her mother, who also relies on this same business. Subsequently with a loan from our institution's Pro Mujer, she created her own business.

The loan that she will now take out is for the increase of capital (buying stucco) that she will acquire from the distributors and the subsequent production. She will sell it in the traditional exhibition at the artisan fair. This form of work allows her to generate resources to maintain her home as much as possible, as she is married. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the health and loan training.

loans.use: buying stucco.

loans.name: Mario Edgardo

texts.es: Mario Edgardo vive junto a su pequeña familia en casa propia. Él posee un taller de enderezado y pintura para automóviles desde hace ya varios años, eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias  y al mismo tiempo logra realizar el mejor trabajo, sabe que es un negocio muy rentable y ya tiene mucha clientela, pues su trabajo es de primera calidad los precios son muy accesibles y además con un servicio excelente, sus clientes siempre quedan satisfechos; Mario es un hombre honrado y muy trabajador, con muchos propósitos a futuro, piensa que para  tener éxito, debes saber qué estás haciendo, te debe gustar lo que estás haciendo y creer en lo que estás haciendo, el cree en su sueño de hacer crecer su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar herramientas, repuestos para enderezados, pintura etc. Mario Edgardo tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mario Edgardo lives with his small family in their own house. He has had a paint and body shop for cars for several years now. This has given him valuable experience, allowing him to obtain the best earnings. At the same time he manages to do the best work. 

He knows that it is a very profitable business, and already has a large clientele. This is because his work is top-quality, the prices are very affordable, and besides, the service is excellent and his customers are always satisfied. Mario is an honest and very hard-working man with many goals for the future. 

He believes that in order to be successful, you must know what you're doing, like what you're doing, and believe in what you're doing. He believes in his dream of making his business grow, and that is why he is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow him to buy tools, parts for body work, paint, etc. 

Mario Edgardo has good payment references and a good moral character. He says he will be able to pay off the debt and at the same time hopes that this way he will be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy tools and parts for paint and body work.

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es:
Doña María una humilde señora de 38 años de edad, originaria de Granada, casada, madre de 2 hijas, la cual solo una está estudiando y la otra trabaja, de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de hielo. Inicio en el ámbito del comercio a la edad de 27 años, comenzó con una pequeña pulpería, la cual les daba muchos créditos a sus clientes y no le pagaban fue por eso que fracaso, fue así que decidió quitarlo el negocio de pulpería y  emprender  el negocio de venta de hielo el cual le genera ganancias a diarias porque cuenta con clientes fijos, en su  negocio recibe el  apoyo de su hija, sus expectativas es ampliar su negocio.
Ella está solicitando el financiamiento para comprar un frízer. Con el propósito de incrementar sus ventas de hielo para obtener mejores ganancias y poder salir adelante con su familia, sus planes futuros es poder volver a establecer nuevamente su negocio de pulpería, para aumentar sus ingresos. Una de sus metas próximas es poder cancelar el crédito para luego volver a solicitar otro.
texts.en:
Maria is a humble woman who is 38 years old. She is originally from Granada, is married, and the mother of two daughters, one of whom is going to school and the other is working. She is a saleswoman - she sells ice. She entered the business arena at the age of 27. She started with a small convenience store and gave her customers a lot of credit, which they didn't pay, and that is why the store failed. She decided, therefore, to get out of the convenience store business and learn the business of selling ice, which generates income daily because she has steady customers. She has her daughter's help for the business, and her expectation is to grow her business.

She is requesting this loan to purchase a freezer. The purpose is to grow her ice sales in order to have better income and be able to move forward with her family. Her future plans are to be able to start a new convenience store in order to supplement her income. One of her next goals is to be able to pay off this loan in order to get another one.

loans.use: purchase a freezer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cosmetics at wholesale.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: Celia vive junto a su familia en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta  de antojitos típicos, pasteles, enchiladas, pupusas, yuca entre otros tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia en el lugar que califico como muy bueno para sus actividades comerciales ya tiene mucha clientela fija que la prefiere porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Celia es una mujer emprendedora, con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito que tanto desea, como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero para ello necesita de capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un credito que le permita comprar verduras, maíz, carne, queso, bebida, etc. Celia tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que le dara a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Celia lives with her family in their own house. She sells traditional snacks, cakes, enchiladas, pupusas (Salvadoran grilled stuffed tortillas), yuca, and other food items. She has several years in this business, and that has given her a great deal of experience in sales, allowing her to obtain the best earnings. 

Her sales location is well-suited to her business, and she already has a large regular clientele that prefers her. This is because everything she sells is top-quality and affordably priced, but above all because the service is excellent.  

Celia is a very enterprising woman, with a great desire to succeed, and always on the lookout for new opportunities that will allow her to achieve the success she so much wishes. Like every good business person, she wants to see her business grow and to carry out new investment, but for this she needs the backing of capital. That is why she is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow her to buy vegetables, corn, meat, cheese, drinks, etc. 

Celia has good payment references and is very responsible. She says that she will be able to pay off the debt, and at the same time hopes that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, corn, meat, cheese and drinks.

loans.name: Martina Aracelly

texts.es:
Doña Martina una humilde señora de 31 años de edad, originaria de Granada, casada, madre de 2 hijos entre las edades de 3 y 8 años, de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de ropa usada. Inicio su actividad  laboral desde muy joven trabajando en el ámbito del comercio, con pequeños préstamos  financieros, la cual pudo comprar 2 pacas de ropa, fue así  que comenzó su trabajo de venta de ropa, negocio que le genera ganancias a diarias,  cuenta con clientes, cuenta con el apoyo de su mama, sus expectativas es hacer crecer su negocio. 
Se acerca la temporada escolar y es por esta razón que ella está solicitando el financiamiento para comprar ropa, cuadernos, lapicero, borrador, regla, etc. con el objetivo de incrementar el inventario de su mercadería para aprovechar  la temporada de venta, para obtener mejores ganancias en su negocio, sus planes futuros es diversificar su mercadería aún más para ofrecer más variedad de ropa  a su clientela.
texts.en:
Martina a humble lady of 31 years of age, native of Granada, married, mother of 2 children between the ages of 3 and 8 years old, works as a seller. She sells second hand clothes. She started working at a very young age, in business, with small loans, which allowed her to buy 2 bundles of clothes. This is how she started her business selling clothes. This business earns her money every day; she has customers, and the support of her mother. She hopes to grow the business.
 
The start of the school year is approaching and for this reason she is requesting this loan to buy clothes, copybooks, pencils, erasers, rulers, etc. With the aim of increasing her stock of merchandise to take advantage of this selling period and so get better earnings in her business. Her future plans are to diversify her stock to offer a greater variety of clothes to her customers.

loans.use: to buy clothes, copybooks, pencils, erasers, rulers, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es:
Rosa una  humilde señora de 36 años de edad, originario de Masaya, pero actualmente vive en Granada, acompañada, madre de 3 hijos de 7, 8 y 16 años, de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de raspado del que es propietaria hace más de 20 años. Inicio en el ámbito del comercio a la edad de 14 años, vendiendo sorbetes con su abuelita, ya que ella le enseño cómo funcionaba este negocio, luego con el tiempo ella decidió seguir con el mismo negocio, pero debido al aumento de precios de los ingredientes para hacer sus sorbetes, los clientes dejaron de comprar sus sorbete, fue así que decidió emprender otro negocio de venta de raspado de forma ambulante, el cual le genera ingresos a diario, cuenta con el apoyo de su hijo mayor.
Rosa está solicitando el crédito para comprar azúcar, almidón, vasos, leche condensada, cucharas, etc. Ya que ella estima que este préstamo le ayudaría a comprar toda la materia prima que necesita para la elaboración de sus deliciosos raspados, para aprovechar  la temporada de venta que es muy buena, sus planes futuros es poder  pagar este crédito para luego volver a solicitar otro para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, una de sus metas próximas es mejorar la infraestructura de su casa.
texts.en:
Rosa, a humble 36-year-old woman, is originally from Masaya, but currently lives in Granada. She is in a relationship and a mother of three children aged 7, 8, and 16. She works as a merchant selling shaved-ice drinks for more than 20 years. She began working in this trade when she was 14 years old, selling sorbets with her grandmother, since she taught her how this business worked. Eventually, she decided to continue with the same business, but because of the rising prices of the ingredients needed to make her sorbets, her customers quit buying her sorbets. So, she decided to undertake another business in the sales of shaved-ice drinks on foot, which generate a daily income for her. She has the support of her oldest child.

Rosa is requesting the loan to buy sugar, starch, cups, condensed milk, spoons, etc. Considering that, she estimates that this loan would help her buy all of the raw materials that she needs for the production of her delicious shaved-ice drinks, to take advantage of the selling season which is very good. Her future plans are to be able to pay back this loan to soon reapply for another to continue to invest in her business. One of her next goals is to improve the infrastructure of her house.

loans.use: to buy sugar, starch, cups, condensed milk, spoons, etc.

loans.name: Amigas Unidas Group

texts.es: La Sra. María del Carmen es casada y tiene más de 5 años con Edaprospo. Tiene 2 hijos de los cuales uno aún depende de ella y su esposo. María se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace más de 15 años. Con su esfuerzo y trabajo ha podido sobresalir adelante dándole así una mejor vida a su familia. También ha podido avanzar con la construcción de su casa. Actualmente su ingreso lo destina a cubrir los gastos de vestimenta y servicios, mientras que su esposo cubre los gastos de alimentación en su hogar. Su plan para el futuro es tener un negocio mucho  más grande y que se encuentre ubicado dentro de una zona mucho más comercial, también terminar de construir su casa. Ella usó el crédito en la compra de mercadería e insumos para su negocio. María pertenece a la alcancía comunal “Amigas Unidas”, el cual está conformado por 5 personas. Ella lleva el cargo de presidenta desde hace más de 2 años.
texts.en: Ms. Maria del Carmen is married and has over 5 years with EDAPROSPO [see below]. She has 2 children, one of which is still dependent on her and her husband. Maria has been in food sales for over 15 years. With her hard work, she has been able to get ahead providing for a better life for her family.  She has also made progress with the construction of her home. Currently, her earnings are used to cover the cost of clothing and services, while her husbands earnings cover the cost of the home and food.  Her plan for the future is to have a much larger business, that is located within a much more commercial area.  She also wants to finish building her home. She used the loan for the purchase of goods and supplies for her business. Maria belongs to the “Amigas Unidas” ["Friends United"] communal bank, which consists of 5 people. She has held the role of president for more than two years now.

loans.use: For the purchase of merchandise and supplies.

loans.name: Umarali

texts.ru:
Умарали житель района Джиликул. Ему 25 лет. Он холост. Образование у Умарали среднее. Умарали живет с родителями. 
На протяжении четырех лет Умарали занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. Он арендует плодородный земельный участок, где выращивает овощи для продажи. В летнее время года Умарали выращивает бахчевые культуры. 
Умарали берет кредит для закупа семян картошки и топлива.
texts.en: Umarali is a resident of the Jilikul region. He is 25 years old and not married. Umarali has secondary education and lives with his parents. During the last four years Umarali has been sowing agriculture crops. He rents out a fertile plot of land where he grows vegetables for sale. During the summer Umarali grows melons. He is taking out the loan to buy potato seeds and fuel.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and fuel to sow and collect a good harvest.

loans.name: Kamoliddin

texts.ru: Камолиддину 27 лет. Он со своей семьей проживает в районе Сино города Душанбе. Камолиддин хочет приобрести точку продажи на рынке Шохмансур и заняться розничной продажей фруктов. Раньше он приносил фрукты на рынок и отдавал их оптом продавцам. Однако теперь Камолиддин хочет сам продавать фрукты на рынке, так как это прибыльнее. С этим намерением Камолиддин обратился за кредитом. Он просит кредит на сумму 1500 долларов для приобретения точки продажи и фруктов. Он надеется на успешное начало бизнеса.
texts.en: Kamoliddin is 27 years old. He lives in the region of Sino in the city of Dushanbe together with his family. Kamoliddin wants to get a vendor space on the market of Shokhmansur and start selling fruits in retail. He used to bring the fruits to the market and sell to other vendors. However now Kamoliddin wants to sell the fruits on the market himself because it's more profitable. This is why he came to ask for a loan. He is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,500 USD to get a vendor space and buy fruits. He is hoping for a successful start of his business.

loans.use: to get a vendor space and buy fruits.

loans.name: Shodmonjon

texts.ru: Шодмонджону 29 лет. Он женат, отец двоих детей. Жена Шодмонджона работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Сам Шодмонджон занимается земледелием. Однако его интересует животноводческая деятельность. Шодмонджон намерен заниматься куплей и продажей крупно-рогатого скота. Он хочет получить хорошую прибыль с этой деятельности и улучшить условия проживания. Чтобы начать новый бизнес, он запрашивает кредит на сумму 3000 сомони. За счет прибыли Шодмонджон надеется увеличить поголовье скота и тем самым расширить новый бизнес.
texts.en: Shodmondjon is 29 years old. He is married and is a father of two children. Shodmondjon's wife works in the village collective farm. Shodmondjon does land cultivation. However he is interested in animal husbandry. Shodmondjon plans to start buying and selling large horned cattle. He wants to get a good profit from this business and improve his living conditions. He is asking for a loan in the amount of 3,000 somoni to start his new business. Shodmondjon hopes to increase the headcount of cattle by using the profit from the loan and by that expand his new business.

loans.use: to buy and resell cattle.

loans.name: Tatiana Lissete

texts.es:
Tatiana  vive en  el cantón libertad, Tiene 22 años. Es soltera no tiene hijos. Ella  tomo  la decisión de buscar trabajo para salir adelante y terminar de estudiar. Como nadie le daba la oportunidad de trabajar en una empresa. 

Ella  decide juntar dinero  para dar apertura  a su negocio de venta de comida. En la actualidad su negocio poco a poco creció  hasta llegar a tener  una clientela  necesaria. Tatiana  trabaja  diariamente,  desde las 8:00am  hasta 19:00pm vendiendo cosmeticos.  
Con el préstamo comprara  perfumes, cremas, desodorantes. Su meta es tener su propio restaurante y sus propios colaboradores.
texts.en:
Tatiana lives in the canton of Libertad. She is 22 years old, single, and has no children. Tatiana made the decision to look for work so that she can could get ahead and finish her studies. However, no one was offering the opportunity to work for a company.

She decided to gather her money so that she could start a business of selling food. Her business has grown gradually to the point that she has the customers that she needs. Tatiana now works every day from 8:00 A.M. to 7:00 P.M. selling cosmetics. With this loan, she will buy perfumes, crèmes, and deodorants.

Her goal is to have her own restaurant and her own employees.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, crèmes, and deodorants.

loans.name: Franz Tamayo Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FRANZ TAMAYO”  iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Julia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: costura de chamarras, tejido de bayetas, embolsado de cereales, venta de comida, tejido de mantas de alpaca, venta de pasankalla y fideo tostado, tienda de barrio.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Julia es integrante, ella indica que hace seis años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de su amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración y venta de ropa en las fronteras bolivianas; cuenta que este negocio lo implemento hace 20 años aprendiendo el mismo de sus amigas que constantemente viajaban.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de lana) que adquirirá de las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializara en la frontera Bolivia - Perú. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene cinco hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Franz Tamayo” is starting its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Collpani Community Center. This group consists of nine members and is led by a Board of Directors headed by Sra. Julia as its president. The members of this Communal Bank engage in various business activities such as making jackets, knitting wiping cloths, packaging grain, selling food, weaving alpaca blankets, selling popcorn and toasted noodles, and managing a neighborhood store.

This loan will benefit small entrepreneurs such as Sra. Julia. She says that she joined Pro Mujer six years ago after a friend invited her to become a member of the organization. At the moment, she has a business of making and selling clothes along the Bolivian border. She says that she started her business 20 years ago after learning the trade from friends who were constantly traveling.

The loan she is receiving now will increase her operating capital for buying wool, which she acquires at the fairs in the city of El Alto. Afterwards, she sells what she produces along the border between Bolivia and Peru. Working in this manner enables her to generate income to support her household. Julia is married and has five children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Julia said that she enjoys the health topics.

loans.use: to buy wool for making clothes to sell.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: María Teresa, es una mujer de 65 años, madre de cinco hijos de 34, 40, 42, 44 y 46 años de edad, todos independientes, es comerciante, tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de leche de vaca, frijoles cocidos y popscicles, estos productos los vende en su casa, ella solicita el crédito porque pretende reparar el techo  del área de la sala de su casa, ya que, actualmente, la estructura del techo es de manera y está un poco deteriorado, desde hace un año quería realizar estas mejoras, pero por falta de disponibilidad económica se le había visto imposibilitado, pero con la ayuda del préstamo y el apoyo de su hija menor podrá hacer su sueño realidad, María Teresa planea comprar materiales de construcción como zinc y perlines
texts.en: Sixty-five year old María Teresa is a mother to five, now grown-up, children.  They are aged 34, 40, 42, 44 and 46 years old.  They are all independent and María Teresa is a shopkeeper.  The small business sells cow's milk, cooked beans and popsicles and is run out of María Teresa's house.  She is applying for a loan as she hopes to fix the roof to one of the rooms of her house as it is currently made of wood and has deteriorated a little.  She has been wanting to do this renovation for a year now but without the financial means it was impossible.  However, with the help of this loan and support from her youngest daughter, she will be able to make this dream a reality.  María Teresa plans to buy building materials such as zinc and purlins.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as zinc, purlins, cement blocks and other items.

loans.name: Khuriniso

texts.ru:
Хуринисо жительница района Джиликул. Ей 48 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Муж Хуринисо работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Ее сын находится на заработках за рубежом, который по мере возможности помогает родителям. 
Хуринисо более восьми лет занимается животноводством. Она зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Также Хуринисо занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. Этим видом деятельности она занимается десять лет. Хуринисо берет кредит для посева картошки и зелени.
texts.en: Khuriniso is a resident of the Jilikul region. She is 48 years old, married and has three children. Khuriniso's husband works in the village collective farm. Her son is now working aboard and helps his parents when he can. Khuriniso has been doing animal husbandry for more than eight years. She makes a living by breeding large horned cattle. Also Khuriniso plants agriculture crops. She has been in this business for ten years. She is taking out the loan to plant potatoes and greens.

loans.use: to plant potatoes and greens.

loans.name: Yelina

texts.es: Yelina tiene 27 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene una hija, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen Purificada de Angostura”. Su actividad económica principal es la crianza de animales menores como pollos.  Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone  en su trabajo.  En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar pollos. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Yelina is 27 years old, is in a common-law marriage and has one daughter.  She belongs to the communal bank “Virgen Purificada de Angostura”.  She works raising small animals such as chickens.  She has been in this business for a number of years now and it does well for her thanks to the determination and effort she puts into it.

Yelina is requesting this loan to buy chickens.  She says that the loan makes her happy and she promises to make the related payments.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Irene

texts.es:
La socia continua con su negocio de restaurante ,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia prepara desayunos,almuerzos y cenas,la socia prepara diferentes tipos de platos como arroz, con pollo,saltados,sopas entre otros,la socia es una persona responsable siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia. 

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de insumos como arroz,aceite entre otros.
La socia se compromete a hacer sus pagos en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The loan recipient continues with her restaurant business.  She has been in this business for years, and it is going well for her thanks to the daily effort she puts into it.  She prepares breakfasts, lunches and dinners. She makes different types of dishes like chicken and rice, beef stir fry, and soups, among others. She is a responsible person, and this is the way she gets her family ahead.

She is requesting the loan to buy supplies like rice and cooking oil, among others.  She pledges to make her payments in the established time period.

loans.use: to buy supplies like rice and cooking oil, among others.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicandose a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas y gallos,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia cria a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan y para las distintas ferias que se realizan,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de gallinas para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member keeps raising small animals, such as hens and roosters. She has had this business for years and it is going well for her, thanks to the hard work she puts into her business every day. She raises these animals to later sell them to her customers who order them or at different markets where they are sold.  This is how she gets her family ahead. 

She is asking for this loan to buy hens for her business. She is grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy chickens for her business.

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD - CCACHIMAYO,la socia sigue con su negocio de venta de salchipapas,la socia vende de forma ambulatoria a los clientes que le solicitan,la socia se siente bien con su negocio ya que mediante este la socia puede sacar adelante a su familia,la socia vende desde las 05:00pm hasta las 10:00pm aproximadamente,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como aceite,salchichas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The loan recipient is a member of the Solidaridad – Cachimayo communal bank. She continues with her business of selling ‘salchipapas’ [sausage and French fries].  She sells in an itinerant manner to customers who request her food.  She feels good about her business because this is the way she is able to get her family ahead.  She sells from approximately 5:00 p.m. until 10:00 p.m.

She wishes to be able to continue working in order to continue supporting her family.  She is requesting the loan to buy supplies like cooking oil and sausages, among others.  She is grateful for the loan that was granted, and she pledges to make her payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy supplies like cooking oil and sausages, among others.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
La socia Alicia continua dedicandose al negocio de venta de carne y quinua,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia viaja cada cierto tiempo a Machupicchu para vender su mercaderia  de forma ambulatoria repartiendo a sus clientes que le solicitan,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de carne para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower continues with her business of selling meat and quinoa.  She has been in the business for years, and it is going well for her thanks to the daily effort she puts into it.  She travels every so often to Machupicchu to sell her merchandise.  She sells in an itinerant manner, delivering to customers who request her food.  This is the way she gets her family ahead.

She is requesting the loan to buy meat for her business.  She is grateful for the loan she was given, and she pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy meat for her business.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD - CCACHIMAYO,la socia sigue con su negocio de venta de ropa interior y venta de zapatos,la socia se siente bien con su negocio ya que mediante este la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia continua mandando dinero a su hermana para que ella pueda comprar la mercaderia que la socia necesita para vender a sus clientes,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.


La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de ropa interior para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the SOLIDARIDAD - CCACHIMAYO communal bank. She continues to work at her business selling underwear and shoes. She is happy with her business since with it she gets her family ahead. She continues to send money to her sister so she can buy merchandise her sister needs to sell to her customers. She would like to keep working in this way to support her family. 


She is asking for this loan to buy underwear for her business. She is grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy underwear for her business.

loans.name: Helmuth

texts.es: Helmuth tiene 43 años de edad y es soltero y aun no tiene hijos, él pertenece al banco comunal “Fuente de Vida”. Su actividad económica principal es la elaboración de artesanía específicamente hace pintura con acuarelas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone  en su trabajo.  En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para implementar su taller de artesanía y comprar materiales como acuarelas y pinceles. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Helmuth is 43 years old, single, and has no children.  He is a member of the community bank Fuente de Vida.  He mainly works making crafts, specifically paintings done with watercolors.  It has been a few years since he started this business and it is going very well thanks to the effort he puts into his work.  

He is requesting this loan to set up his workshop and purchase supplies such as watercolors and brushes.  He is happy with the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as watercolors and brushes.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD - CCACHIMAYO,la socia sigue dedicandose al negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes y chanchos,la socia se siente bien con su negocio ya que mediante este la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia cria a sus animales para luego venderlos en las distintas ferias que se realizan, a la vez la socia continua alquilando su carro para taxi, siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.


La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de cuyes para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank Solidaridad - Cachimayo (Solidarity - Cachimayo). She continues to work, raising small animals such as guinea pigs and pigs. She is comfortable in this line of work considering that through it, she is able to help her family get ahead. Roxana raises animals and sells them in various fairs held in her area. At the same time, she also rents out her car for use as a taxi. With the income from both of these businesses she is able to help her family move forward.

Roxana is requesting another loan in order to buy guinea pigs for her business. She is grateful to have the loan offered to her, and she pledges to make all of her repayments punctually.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs for her business.

loans.name: Marisol Modesta

texts.es: Marisol pertenece al banco comunal “Fuente de Vida” y su actividad económica principal es la venta de ropa. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone  en su trabajo.  En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar ropa. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Marisol belongs to the communal bank "Fuente de Vida" "Spring of Life". Her principal economic activity is clothing sales. She has worked in this business for several years now and it has gone very well for her, thanks to the determination she puts into her work. 

In this opportunity, Marisol requires a loan in order to buy clothing. She is very happy to have the loan and she promises to complete all of her repayments punctually.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La socia continúa en el banco comunal “Fuente de Vida” y con la actividad económica principal de venta de productos naturales a base de café. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone  en su trabajo.  En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar café.  Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
This member continues as a member of the communal bank group "Fuente de Vida" (Spring of Life), as well as with her business selling natural products made from coffee. She has been working in this business for several years now, and it has gone very well for her, thanks to the determination that drives her in her work. 

In this opportunity, she requires a loan in order to buy coffee. She is happy to have this loan and promises to make all of her repayments punctually.

loans.use: to buy coffee.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
El socio continua dedicandose a brindar el servicio de tours, el socio presta servicio de turismo, el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su trabajo,el socio realiza tours como:Valle Sagrado,City Tours entre otros,el socio se siente bien con su negocio ya que mediante este el socio puede sacar adelante a su familia.

El socio solicita el credito para la compra de repuestos y para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro.
El socio esta agradecido con el credito y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Hector continues making a living in the tourism business. He has been working in this business for several years now and has been successful, thanks to the determination that drives him in his work. He runs tours to Valle Sagrado, City tours in Cusco, and others. Hector is comfortable in this business considering that it allows him to help his family get ahead. 

Hector is requesting this loan in order to buy spare parts and to do some maintenance work on his car. He is grateful for this loan and promises to make all of his repayments punctually.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and to do some maintenance work on his car.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal “Fuente de Vida” y su actividad económica principal es la  venta de carne. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone  en su trabajo.  En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar carne.  Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank group "Fuente de Vida" (Spring of Life). Her principal economic activity is meat sales. Valentina has worked in this business for various years now, and it has gone very well for her thanks to the determination that drives her in work. 

In this opportunity, Valentina requires a loan to buy meat. She is happy to have this loan and promises to make all of her repayments punctually.

loans.use: to buy meat.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La socia continua en el banco comunal “Fuente de Vida” y su actividad económica principal es la venta de artesanía específicamente textil como por ejemplo chompas, chalinas, guantes, chullos y entre otros. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone  en su trabajo.  En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar chompas y mantas. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The member continues with Fuente de Vida Communal Bank.  Her main job is selling crafts, specifically textiles such as sweaters, scarves, gloves, wool caps, and other things.  She has made a living in this business for several years and it's going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her job.

She needs the loan now to buy sweaters and blankets.

She's happy about the loan and pledges to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy sweaters and blankets

loans.name: San Carlos Group

texts.es:
El presente comité se encuentra, en su décimo  segundo   ciclo es un comité ejemplar. Una de las miembros, la Sra. Milca, quien vende todo tipo de cosméticos, es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora, se hizo de muy buena clientela ya que siempre trae productos de buena calidad y a muy buen precio.
Ella solicita de este crédito para la compra de cosméticos de todas marcas, para poder seguir con sus ventas y ofrecer a sus clientes buena variedad.
El grupo está contento por la oportunidad que ha recibido por parte de kiva y fundación ya que les será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
This group is in its twelfth cycle and it is an exemplary group. One of the members, Sra. Milca, sells all kinds of cosmetics and is a hardworking, enterprising woman. She built up a very good customer base by offering good-quality products at a very good price.

Mrs. Milca is requesting this loan to buy cosmetics of different brands in order to be able to continue with her sales and offer a good assortment to her customers.

The group members appreciate the opportunity that Kiva and the foundation has given them, since it will be of great help.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Filomena

texts.es:
Filomena, de 58 años, es una mujer amable y trabajadora, esta casada hace 29 años con su compañero fiel de toda la vida Marcelo de 61 años y con quien tiene cinco hijos a quienes brindó lo mejor para su educación, ahora ella vive junto a su esposo en su casa propia en donde a diario trabaja mucho para así poder tener una vejez tranquila.
El trabajo de nuestra amiga Nancy consiste en la venta de abarrotes. Tiene su tienda en donde atiende durante las mañanas con mucho esmero, ofrece a la venta artículos de primera necesidad como huevos, arroz, plátano, harina, leche y otros. Lleva en este trabajo 7 años y le va muy bien. Por las tardes vende comida en la vereda de su casa a partir de las 5 de la tarde hasta las 10 de la noche aproximadamente. Actualmente tiene todos sus esfuerzos orientados a expandir e incrementar tu tienda para dejar de realizar la venta de comida y empezar a disfrutar sus años al lado de su pareja y generar sus ingresos en la tranquilidad de su hogar. 

Le gusta mucho lo que hace pues siempre considera que su pasión es la atención al público y el trato directo con ellos, es por eso que todos sus trabajos han tenido esta orientación, espera seguir trabajando con mayor esmero y hacer crecer su negocio.
Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprará abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite, embutidos, leche, huevos, golosinas y otros productos que requiere para incrementar la cantidad de artículos que pone a la venta en su bodega.
texts.en:
Filomena, 58, is a kind and hard-working woman.  She has been married for 29 years to her faithful husband Marcelo, 61, with whom she has five children.  She has offered them the best for their education.  She now lives together with her husband in their own house where she works hard to be able to enjoy old age comfortably.

Our friend Nancy's work consists of the sale of groceries.  She has a store which she tends to with great care.  She offers basic goods like eggs, rice, plaintains, flour, milk, and others.  She has been doing this work for the last seven years and it has gone very well.  In the afternoons, she sells food in the lane outside her house between the hours of 5 and 10 PM, approximately.  Currently, she is focusing all her efforts on expanding her store to be able to phase out her food sales business and enjoy her years alongside her husband, generating income in the comfort of their home.

She enjoys what she does very much and has always considered customer service and their satisfaction to be her passion.  It is for this reason that all of her jobs have had this in common.  She hopes to continue working with great care and make her business grow.  With the amount requested of 2000 soles, she will purchase groceries such as rice, sugar, oil, meats, milk, eggs, snacks and other products that she requires to expand the quantity of articles that she puts up for sale in her small store.

loans.use: to purchase groceries such as rice, sugar, oil, meats, milk, eggs, snacks and other products that she needs to expand the quantity of articles she has for sale in her small store.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
Javier, de 50 años es un hombre tímido. Vive desde hace 20 años en la casa que heredó de su madre, junto a sus 2 hijos: Luzmila y Melania.  
Hace 13 años enviudó, desde ese entonces trabajó para mantener a su familia. Cuenta que siempre le gustó cocinar, anteriormente su esposa se dedicaba a trabajar como peón en diversos sembríos, mientras él cuidaba de su restaurante, donde vendía comida china. “en mis mejores tiempos, mi restaurante era uno de los mejores restaurantes, cuando mi esposa murió tuve que cerrar”, afirma con melancolía. Es así que hace pocos meses, con la ayuda de su asociación comenzó a sembrar en los terrenos que alquila de manera anual, donde siembra alverja, maíz, quinua y papa, los cuales vende en la ciudad a buenos precios; pues tiene buena calidad ya que son orgánicos.
Él pertenece al grupo solidario “Cruz de espinas” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, en todo estos años de trabajo obtuvo buenos resultados en su negocio y en su vida personal, por lo que se encuentra agradecido, por ello promete ser puntual con sus cuotas, además le agrada pertenecer a su asociación, pues se apoyan y son como una familia.
Javier, invertirá el dinero en la compra de insumos como cebolla, arroz, azúcar y huevos para la preparación de sus alimentos.
texts.en:
Javier, 50, is a shy man. He has been living in the home that he inherited from his mother for 20 years together with his two children: Luzmila and Melania. Presently he finds himself confronted with a difficult problem; he lost his housing documents; he will recover the duplicates within a few months. 13 years ago he became a widower. Since then, he has worked in order to support his family. He has always liked to cook. His wife used to work as a laborer in various crops while he looked after his restaurant where he sold Chinese food: "in my best days, it was one of the best restaurants, when my wife passed I had to close down," he says wistfully. It's like this that a few months ago, with the help of his communal bank, he began to plant in the land that he rents on an annual basis. He grows peas, corn, quinoa, and potatos which he sells in the city at great prices since they are good quality and organic.

He belongs to the solidarity group "Cruz de espinas" and this is his third loan with MFP. In all these years of working, he has gotten good results in his business and in his personal life for which he is grateful. Because of this, he promises to be punctual with his payments. Moreover, he likes being a part of his communal bank since they support one another and are like a family.

Javier will use this money to buy ingredients such as onion, rice, sugar, and eggs for food preparation.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as onion, rice, sugar, and eggs for food preparation.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys, de 35 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy trabajadora,convive con Carlos de 42 años con quien tiene tres hijos. Ella trabaja mucho para poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
El trabajo de Gladys consiste en la compra y venta de artefactos, además de repararlos y ponerlos en funcionamiento. Ha establecido su taller de trabajo en la parte frontal de su casa, ahí abren sus puertas diariamente en espera de las personas que desean deshacerse de algunos artefactos que tienen algún desperfecto. Cada producto que adquiere es reparado con mucho cuidado para que vuelvan a ser útiles. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 7 años y lo hace a lado de su pareja.
Se siente muy bien con su trabajo ya que le permite tener buenos ingresos económicos a parte de estar en su hogar y poder ver y atender a sus hijos como ella desea, cuando se iniciaron tenían poco clientes, pero con el pasar del tiempo se han ido incrementando gracias al buen trabajo que realiza. Le esta yendo muy bien ya que con lo que gana puede sustentar las necesidades de su hogar, ahora desea ampliar su negocio y poder comprar mas artefactos usados para seguir reparándolos y dejarlos en óptimas condiciones.
Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará mas artefactos y piezas de reparación para continuar vendiendo los artículos reparados.
texts.en:
Gladys is 35 years old.  She is a good, friendly and very hard-working woman.  She lives with Carlos, who is 42 years old.  Together, they have three children.  Gladys works a lot to be able to offer a better quality of life for her family.

Gladys’s work consists of buying and selling appliances.  She repairs them and gets them in working order. She has set up her workshop in the front part of her house.  They open the doors every day in hopes that people will want to get rid of appliances that have some imperfection. Each product Gladys acquires is repaired very carefully to make it useful again. She has been doing this work for 7 years alongside her partner.

Gladys feels good about her work since it allows her to have a good income while being in her home and able to see and attend to her children as she pleases. When she started, she had few clients, but as time has gone on, they have grown, thanks to the good work that she and her partner do. It is going very well, and they have been able to take care of their household needs with what they earn.  Now, Gladys wants to expand her business and be able to buy more used appliances to continue repairing them and leaving them in optimal condition.

With the loan of 1500 soles, Gladys will buy more appliances and spare parts to continue selling the repaired appliances.

loans.use: to buy more appliances and spare parts to continue selling the repaired appliances.

loans.name: Jaklin

texts.es:
Jaklin, de 30 años, es una mujer amable, beuna y emprendedora, es madre de Adriana de 05 años a quien cría desde haces tres años sola, pues se separo de su conviviente y ahora tiene que asumir la crianza de su menor hija, vive en su casa propia y a diario trabaja mucho para poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su menor hija.
A diario, Jaklin sale en busca de sus clientes, transita mucho por toda la ciudad debido a que tiene que visitar a sus amigos, familiares y vecinos, su negocio consiste en la venta de zapatos, sandalias, zapatillas y otros, tiene dos formas de venderlos, al contado o al crédito, el precio varia dependiendo al tiempo y la modalidad que desee el cliente adquirirlos. Lleva realizando su trabajo por 02 años y trabaja sola.
Le gusta mucho su trabajo ya que le permite disponer de su tiempo según ella desee, además de poder mejorar sus ingresos a través de sus ventas, durante el tiempo que está haciendo su trabajo, aprendió mucho sobre sus clientes, es por eso que le trata muy bien y siempre les brinda una sonrrisa, tiene muchos planes a futuro, pero lo que mas desea ahora es consolidar su negocio y algún momento poder tener un local en donde pueda atender a sus clientes con mayor comodidad. Este será el crédito número 04 con MFP, por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo, además está muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos sus integrantes son muy responsables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará mas calzados al por mayor, ya que desea empezar a ofrecer calzados para niños y caballeros, esto le permitirá mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Thirty year old Jaklin is a good, friendly and enterprising woman.  She is mother to five year old Adriana, whom she has been raising on her own for the last three years, after she separated from her partner.  She now has to look after her young daughter.  She lives in her own house and works hard every day in order to provide her young daughter with a better quality of life.

Jaklin goes out looking for customers on a daily basis.  She travels throughout the city as she has to visit friends, family and neighbours.  Her business is selling shoes, sandals, trainers and other footwear.  Customers can pay for the shoes in one go, or in installments.  The price varies according to the time and type of payment the customer wants.  She has been doing this for two years and she works alone.

She really likes her work as it allows her to organise her time as she wishes and also because she is able to increase her income through sales.  In the time that she has been doing this, Jaklin has learned a lot about her customers.  For this reason she treats them well and always gives them a smile.  She has many plans for the future but what she wants most is to consolidate her business and one day to have her own place where she can tend to her customers more comfortably.  This will be Jaklin's fourth loan with MFP and she hopes for your collaboration so that she can put her plans into reality.  Once again, Jaklin promises to make her repayments on time, as she did with previous loans.  She is very happy to belong to the communal bank as all its members are responsible and supportive.  With the loan of 1000 Nuevo Soles that she has applied for, she will buy more footwear in bulk as she wants to start offering footwear for children and gentlemen.  This will allow her to improve sales.

loans.use: to buy more footwear in bulk.

loans.name: De Peguaho Group

texts.es:
El comité De Peguaho se encuentra en el cuarto ciclo. Está conformado por 12 mujeres con diferentes actividades, este grupo se formó a partir de promociones realizadas en la zona.
Cindy, la presidenta, vende prendas de toda clase y tipo, como ser remeras, shorts, pantalones, vestidos y demás. Ella es muy conocida por la ciudad y se ha hecho de muy buena clientela gracias a la variedad que siempre tiene y también gracias a que es muy amable con sus clientes.
Cindy es una persona entusiasta que siempre trata de ayudar a sus amigas en todo lo que puede. Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de remeras, pantalones, jeans y demás prendas para poder venderlas.
texts.en:
The De Peguaho committee is in its fourth cycle and is made up of 12 ladies with different businesses.  It was formed after some promotions in the zone.

Cindy, the president, sells all types and styles of clothing, such as t-shirts, shorts, pants, dresses, and other things.  She is well known throughout the city and has gotten good customers, thanks to the variety of merchandise that she has and also because she is friendly to her customers.

Cindy is an enthusiastic person who always tries to help her friends with all she can.  She is king for this loan to buy t-shirts, pants, jeans, and other articles of clothing for resale.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: La Amistad Group

texts.es:
El comité La Amistad” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní, donde cada una de ellas siempre se esfuerza por sus familias, para poder darles todo lo que necesitan para una vida mejor.
Las señoras Jovina y Ortencia se dedican a la venta de chipa, diariamente trabajan juntas en la elaboración. Comentan que gracias al crédito pudieron aumentar su clientela por que construyeron un Horno más grande, esta vez solicitan de este crédito para la compra de los ingredientes de la chipa, la cual es un alimento típico paraguayo, desean compra almidón, queso, anís, huevo y demás. Agradecen por la gran ayuda que reciben pues gracias a esto están creciendo y ayudan a los suyos.
texts.en:
The group “La Amistad” (Friendship) started with the union of various neighborhoods in the city of Santaní; each one of these is always strengthened by its families, in order to give them everything they need for a better life.

Jovina and Ortencia work selling chipas (cheese buns). Every day, they work together in the preparation. They say that, thanks to the loan, they were able to increase their customer base because they built a bigger oven. 

This time, they are requesting a loan for the purchase of ingredients for chipa, which is a typical Paraguayan food. They wish to buy starch, cheese, anise, eggs, and other items. They are grateful for the great help that they receive, because thanks to this, they are expanding and helping their families.

loans.use: to purchase starch, cheese, anise, eggs, and other items for preparing cheese buns.

loans.name: Las Verduleras Unidas Group

texts.es:
Las verduleras unidas se denomina un buen grupo de mujeres conformado en la ciudad de Itá, gracias a que una de las miembros contactó con la asesora en una reunión semanal que la misma tenía en la zona, para informarse de la forma de trabajo que tiene el Comité de Mujeres, están en su sexto ciclo y trabajan por seguir creciendo.
Todas ellas son mujeres que se dedican a la venta de verduras y es por eso que el grupo lleva ese nombre. Una de las miembros es la Sra. Pablina, quien cometa que trabaja arduamente día con día por salir adelante.
Solicita este crédito para la compra de verduras para la venta, para que por medio de eso siga trabajando y ganándose el sustento del día a día.
texts.en:
Las verduleras unidas [The United Vegetable Sellers] is made up of a good group of women from the city of Itá. 

They were formed when one of the members got in touch with a counselor from a weekly meeting held in the area. She informed her of what type of work the Women's Committee does, that it is in its sixth cycle and still growing.
