 La señora Josefina es la presidenta del comité, ella se dedica a la compra y venta  de ropa y lencería, tiene muy buena venta que sus clientes siempre le hacen muchos pedidos. Ella comenta que gracias a su trabajo ayuda a su familia y salen adelante.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de prendas, para poder venderlas y de esta forma seguir con su negocio que tanto la está ayudando.
texts.en:
The 12 members of this group got together with the goal of helping each other and though that work improve themselves.  The group is called Unidas Para Mejorar [Together for Improvement] since they all meet to help themselves and improve their quality of life.

Josefina is the president of the group.  She works buying and selling clothing and underwear.  She has good sales because her customers always place many orders.  She says that thanks to her work she helps her family and they improve themselves.  

She is requesting this loan to purchase clothing in order to sell them and continue her business.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to sell.

loans.name: Esther Group

texts.en:
Esther Group is comprised of ten women members who are residents of T. Mangjol Village. The village is located on the western outskirts of Imphal, capital of Manipur, which is one of the seven-sister states in North East India. These destitute tribal women have committed themselves to finding means to strengthen and sustain themselves and their families for which purpose the group has been formed.

Kimneng, the one standing with her hand raised in the picture, is the profiled member. She is 35 and a mother to five school-going children, three sons and two daughters. Her husband makes furniture, which is the main source of income for the family. Her husband being the lone breadwinner for the family, it has been quite difficult for the parents to raise their children. To assist her husband, she is determined to find a way to make some earnings from any source available.

In 2009, financially assisted by WSDS, she started her business in charcoal. She bought bags of charcoal from different people living in and around the village at lower rates and sold them in the main market at higher rates. This profited her and because of this earning, the financial condition of the family was improved. On the other hand, for customers who are not able to pay the price on the spot, she extends credit facility on a monthly basis and this in turn gives satisfaction to the public in general. This time, she is planning to expand the business by buying more bags of charcoal and also supplying it to more areas including those which she has not reached yet.

Not only her, the other members are engaged in piggery and selling vegetables, rice, milk, soap and detergents. Each member has been successful in their respective business and also has fully repaid their loan.

loans.use: To buy bags of charcoal and sell them at a profit

loans.name: Cuatro Bocas Group

texts.es:
El comité “Cuatro Boca” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní. Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes, y los fines de semanas organizan actividades para recaudar fondo y de eso pagar sus cuotas. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo.
Juana se dedica a la cría y venta de animales de corral, como ser gallinas, vacas, patos y demás. Cuenta que su sueño es poder tener un día una gran granja para poder tener más animales y de esa forma poder seguir ayudando a su familia e ir mejorando su casa.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de maíz, balanceados y demás insumos que pueda necesitar para sus animales.
texts.en:
The Cuatro Boca group was formed by neighbors in the city of Santani.  All of the members of the group work doing different activities.  On the weekends, they organize activities to collect money to pay their installments.  The members form a very united and capable group and they do activities together that strengthens their bond.  

Juana works raising and selling animals such as chickens, cows, ducks, and others.  She says that her dream is to have a large farm one day so that she can have more animals which will allow her to continue helping her family and improve their home.

She is requesting this loan to purchase corn, feed, and other supplies she needs to care for her animals.

loans.use: to purchase feed, corn, and other supplies.

loans.name: Betania Group

texts.en:
Ester, who is in her early 70s, is a widow. She has six children who are grown-ups. She has also got four grandchildren who are still going to school. She has been a food vendor for ten years now.  She works from 6.00 AM to 8.00 PM daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be her eleventh loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to cater for herself, bought a radio, sofa set, TV set, a plot of land, built a small house in her village, bought a bed, a mattress, restocked the missing items in her food stock, covered household expenses and has paid back all her loans successfully.  She will use the loan she is requesting to buy more stock of food and sell to more customers. She dreams of building her own house.

Esther will share this loan with her loan group "BETANIA" which has a total of 16 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more stock of  food and sell to more customers.

loans.name: Het

texts.en: Het is 31 years old. He is married and resides with one child in Takeo Province, Cambodia. He has been running public motorcycle transportation (a Tuk Tuk) for more than three years, making an income of $5 daily. His wife is involved in breeding pigs. She earns about $2 each day. In order to improve his family’s finances, Het requests a loan of $1000 to purchase fodder and piglets for breeding. By doing so, he would earn more income to financially support the family. In the future, he would like to expand the business and send his child to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase fodder and piglets for breeding

loans.name: Bopha

texts.en: Bopha is 28 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been making brooms to sell for more than two years, earning approximately $6 daily. Her husband helps her run the business. In order to improve her business, Bopha is requesting a loan of $1100 to purchase more materials for producing more brooms to sell. By doing so, she would be able to earn more income to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to expand the business and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase materials for producing more brooms to sell

loans.name: Angelina

texts.es:
La Señora Angelina tiene 59 años, es una señora muy trabajadora, es madre soltera, vive en la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo desde hace 20 años. La señora Angelina  tiene una despensa bien surtida,  empezó con unos pocos productos y luego  fue aumentando con los préstamos que hizo de la Fundacion Paraguaya y  con sus ganancias. Comenta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado porque solo ella y su hijo trabajan en la familia.
Su sueño es comprar otra casilla mas en el Cruce Internacional porque su local comercial ya le resulta chico. Ella solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de Yerba, gaseosas, cervezas y demás insumos para poder seguir teniendo bien surtido su negocio y ayudar así a su familia.
texts.en:
Angelina, 59, is a very hardworking woman.  She's a single mother and has lived in the city of Coronel Oviedo for 20 years.  Angelina has a very well-stocked general store.  She began with a few products and then started expanding with her loans from Fundación Paraguaya and her profits.  She says her work is very demanding because she and her son are the only ones in her family who work.

Her dream is to buy another stand in the Cruce Internacional area because her commercial space is small for her now.

She's requesting this loan to be able to invest in buying yerba mate, soda, beer, and other supplies to be able to continue having her business well stocked and to help her family.

loans.use: to buy yerba mate, soda, beer, and other supplies

loans.name: Virgen Del Carmen Group

texts.es:
El comité Virgen del Carmen se encuentra en el noveno ciclo. Está conformado por 24 mujeres con diferentes actividades, este grupo se formó a partir de promociones realizadas en la zona. Ellas son de la ciudad de Paraguarí, y gracias al trabajo que hacen juntas están saliendo adelante.
 Una de estas mujeres es la Sra. María quien se dedica a la costura, ella comenta que al principio empezó con un pequeño taller, pero que ha ido creciendo lentamente y gracias a su trabajo. Se define como una persona muy trabajadora y que quiere salir adelante, y es por eso que se esfuerza mucho para poder salir adelante.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de telas, hilos, botones, cierres y demás, para poder seguir trabajando y teniendo los medios para cumplir con pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The Virgen del Carmen communal bank is in its ninth loan cycle.  It's made up of 24 women with different jobs.  This group formed following some promotions that were made in the area.  They're from the city of Paraguarí and they're getting ahead thanks to the work they do together.

One of these women is María, who makes a living sewing.  She says that in the beginning she had a small workshop but that it has grown slowly thanks to her work.  She shows herself to be a very hardworking person who wants to get ahead.  This is why she makes a big effort to be able to get ahead.

She's requesting this loan to buy fabric, thread, buttons, zippers, and other supplies to be able to continue working and having the means to fulfill her customers' orders.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons, zippers, and other supplies

loans.name: Santa Barbara Group

texts.es:
El comité “Santa Bárbara” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní. Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes, y los fines de semanas organizan actividades como la venta de sopa, pollo al horno  para recaudar fondo y de eso pagar sus cuotas.
La Sra. Patrocinia es empleada y comenta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado y quiere poder ayudar a su familia de otra forma. Comenta que solicita de este préstamo para abrir una despensa y de esa forma tener un ingresos extra y poder ayudar más a su familia.
texts.en:
The Santa Bárbara group was formed by neighbors in the city of Santani.  All of the members of the group do different work independently and on the weekends they organize activities such as the sale of soup and baked chicken to raise funds to pay their installments.  

Patrocinia is employed and says that her work is very difficult.  She wants to be able to help her family in another way.  She is requesting this loan in order to open a grocery store so that she will have extra income and be able to help her family more.

loans.use: to open a grocery store.

loans.name: Kong

texts.en: Kong is 53 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been cultivating rice and fattening up animals for more than ten years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband helps her run the business. Two of her children are construction workers. They earn about $7 per day. Due to lack of funds, Kong requests a loan of $1000 to purchase fertilizer and rice seed for farming. In the future, she would like to expand her farmland and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and rice seeds for farming

loans.name: Sovanda

texts.en:
Sovanda is 30 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been working as a construction worker for more than two years, earning approximately $5 daily. Her husband is a construction foreman who makes an income of $10 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Sovanda is requesting a loan of $1,100 to purchase farmland to use for rice cultivation. This money will help her start a new career and generate additional income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand the business and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase farmland to use for rice cultivation.

loans.name: Ratha

texts.en: Ratha is 26 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than ten years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband (who is joining her in the picture) runs a public motorcycle transportation service (tuk tuk). He earns about $7 each day. Due to lack of funds, Ratha requests a loan of $1300 to purchase construction materials finish building her house. This money will help her obtain a comfortable house and provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to run a tailoring shop at home and send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to finish building her house

loans.name: Onortsolmon

texts.en:
Onortsolmon is 28 years old. She lives with her husband and two children in a rental apartment, in the Hentii province of Mongolia. Her husband, Ravjih, age 29, is a teacher at a local school. Her son, Sodbileg, age 6, just enrolled in primary school and her daughter, Nandinbileg, age 2, goes to a local kindergarten. 

Onortsolmon has been working as a chef in a bakery for years. She is now starting her own bakery and ready-made flour production in a rental place. She is now requesting MNT 4,000,000 to purchase equipment and inventory for her newly-started bakery business. She is a well-experienced, well-organized, and hard-working woman.

loans.use: to purchase equipment and inventory for her newly-started bakery business.

loans.name: Phalla

texts.en: Phalla is 41 years old. She has been weaving 'Krama' to sell for more than ten years, earning approximately $5 daily. Her husband (who is joining her in the picture) helps her run the business. One of her children is an electrician who makes an income of $4 each day. Due the difficulty with her family’s transportation, Phalla requests a loan of $800 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will help her reduce their transportation expenses. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Khorn

texts.en: Khorn is 33 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than ten years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband is a construction worker who makes an income of $4 per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Khorn requests a loan of $1000 to purchase a cow to breed and produce a calf to sell. This money will help her earn extra income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand the business and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase a cow to breed and produce a calf to sell

loans.name: Srey Tum

texts.en:
Srey Tum is 42 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Speu, Cambodia. She has been cultivating rice and fattening up animals for more than 10 years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband is a police officer who earns about $5 each day. One child is a driver and the other is a driver assistant. They earn about $6 per day. 

Due to a lack of funds, Srey Tum requests a loan of $1,000 to purchase construction materials to build a new house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to feed pigs in order to generate more income to financially support the family.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a new house.

loans.name: Abdonia

texts.es:
Abdonia es una comerciante, tiene 67 años, se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras principalmente. se dedica a esta actividad hace mas de 10 años y cuenta con un local en un popular mercado de Asunción donde ofrece a sus clientes productos frescos todos los días.
Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que se esfuerza todos los días desde muy tempranas horas, ya que empieza su día de trabajo muy temprano. Ella solicita de este crédito para poder comprar frutas y verduras y de esa forma poder seguir trabajando y dando a su clientela buenos productos.
texts.en:
Abdonia, 67, is a merchant.  She makes a living selling mainly fruits and vegetables.  She has done this work for more than 10 years and she has a place in a popular market in Asunción where she sells fresh products to her customers every day.

She's a very hardworking person who makes an effort every day from very early in the morning, because she begins her work day very early.

She's requesting this loan to be able to buy fruits and vegetables so she can continue working and giving her customers good products.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Amarjargal

texts.en:
Amarjargal, 31 years old, lives with her husband and two children in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. Her husband renders taxi services to local people. She began her clothes-sales business in 2012 and, in just seven months, she has attracted quite a number of customers to her business. Their two children both go to school. 

Each year, during white moon festival, (traditional Mongolian ceremony) demand for clothes increases drastically, so she is requesting a loan of MNT 1,500,000 to purchase clothes in large quantity. As a result, she will run her business without worrying about inventory shortage and she can generate more income for her family. Amarjargal is a very hard-working individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase clothes in large quantity for her business.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en: Ms. Yasmeen is a 45-year-old married woman and a mother of six children. She has been successfully running a hand-embroidery business in her community for the last four years. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are in high demand and she has managed to build a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. Her husband is employed in a small factory and earns insufficient income to support his family alone. She is motivated to provide for her family. As she wants to grow her business, she requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase spools of threads, packs of sequins, pearls and glittering materials for embellishment. She then would be able to meet with the increasing demand with consistency. She dreams to provide a quality education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase spools of threads, packs of sequins, pearls and glittering materials for embellishment.

loans.name: Jamshed

texts.ru:
Чамшед молодой парень в возрасте  26 лет. Он  пока еще не женат живёт с родителями.  Чамшед является водительем такси.  Этим делом он  занимается  более четырех лет.  Он очень трудолюбивый и самостоятельный парень. По словам Чамшеда он пока не хочет жениться так как не имеет средств чтобы кормить семью. Он помогает своим родителям и по понемногу копит.  Его родители с детства учили быть самостоятельным.  
 У него есть собственный автомобиль на котором он развозит пассажиров но он очень часто ремонтирует машину так как машина очень старая, поэтому Чамшед хочет продать его и купить новый. Чтобы купить новый  автомобиль ему не хватает денежных средств поэтому он обратился в организацию Кива за финансовой поддержкой. 
 Добавив полученный кредит к своим накопленным денежных средствам Чамшед планирует купить не дорогой автомобиль и радовать людей перевозкой.  Это дело ему очень нравиться и он намерен дальше заниматься этим видом деятельности. Чамшед заранее благодарит организацию Кива за финансовую поддержку и помощь.
texts.en:
Jamshed is a 26 year old young man. He is not yet married and lives with his parents. Jamshed is a taxi driver. He has been in this business for more than 4 years. He is a very hardworking and self-sufficient person. According to Jamshed, he does not want to get married at this time as he cannot afford to feed a family. He helps out his parents and, little by little, saves money. 

From childhood, his parents taught him to be self-sufficient. He has his own car with which he drives passengers, but he very frequently repairs this car as it is very old. For this reason, Jamshed wants to sell his car and buy a new one. He does not have enough money to buy a new car, which is why he turned to Kiva for financial assistance. 

Adding the loan to his own savings, Jamshed plans to buy an inexpensive car and please his taxi passengers. He really enjoys taxi driving and is determined to continue doing this business. Jamshed thanks Kiva in advance for the financial support and assistance.

loans.use: to buy a car

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en:
Susanna is a 33-year-old mother of 2 children. Together with her husband she is involved in agriculture.
Their livestock currently includes 6 little pigs and 2 cows. Susanna also grows apricot, peach, apple and pear trees. Their agricultural business is the sole financial income for this family and Susanna's monthly income is hardly enough for covering the family's basic costs. Now Susanna has no sufficient funds to feed the livestock. She has applied for this loan to purchase forage for feeding the livestock. Susanna considers this loan to be very important because it will allow her to feed the livestock, to earn more income and thereby improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for forage for feeding the livestock.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El Señor Francisco es de la ciudad Santaní, tiene casa propia, con hijos, su señora se dedica a la venta de productos varios. Es un señor muy trabajador, responsable y muy honesto, empezó a trabajar como zapatero, haciendo compostura de calzados en general y vendiendo zapatos usados.
Viajaba a Ciudad del Este para traer las productos y así tener más ganancias para solventar los gastos de la casa, su sueño de siempre era de tener una despensa bien surtida para poder generar más de ingreso así poder tener una calidad de vida mejor para él y para toda su familia, con su esfuerzo, trabajo y dedicación salió adelante, alcanzando sus metas sin ningún tipo de problema. Hoy ya tiene la despensa que soñaba y solicita este crédito para poder surtirlas con bebidas, comestibles, verduras, leche y demás, y también agradece por esta oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Mr. Francisco is from the city of Santaní.  He has his own home, with children.  His wife earns a living selling various products.  He is a very hard-working, responsible and very honest man.  He started to work as a shoemaker, making general shoe repairs and selling used shoes.  He used to travel to Ciudad del Este to bring his products and thus have more earnings to cover his household expenses.  

His dream had always been to have a well-supplied general store in order to be able to generate more income and thus be able to have a better quality of life for him and his whole family.  With his effort, work and dedication, he succeeded, reaching his goals without any type of problem.  Today, he has the shop he dreamed of and he is requesting this loan in order to be able to supply it with drinks, food products, vegetables, milk and more.  He also is grateful for this opportunity that he is receiving.

loans.use: to buy drinks, food products, vegetables, milk and more.

loans.name: Mukhtar

texts.en: Ms. Mukhtar is a 33-year-old married woman. She has been running a milk sales business for five years. She started her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family when her husband was the only bread earner at that point in time. With the passage of time her sales increased and also her income. Now she has two buffaloes. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. She has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is very thankful to Kashf for their support.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to increase milk production.

loans.name: Alexandr

texts.ru:
Александр  - фермер. С 2003 года занимается выращиванием винограда и персика.
Справляться по хозяйству ему помогает супруга и двое детей 26-ти и 34-х лет, младший сын работает директором школы.
Развитие деятельности начиналось с выращивания персикового сада.
Александр решил приобрести капельную ленту для полива своего участка, т.к. в летний, засушливый период,  очень тяжело осуществлять полив вручную и мотоблок для вспашки своего земельного участка.
В планах на будущие:  заняться выращиванием земляники.
В личных планах:  купить жилой дом для детей.
Нуждается в вашей помощи для финансирования капельной ленты и мотоблока.
texts.en:
Alexandr is a farmer.  Since 2003 he has been growing grapes and peaches.  His wife helps him run the farm as do his children who are 26 and 34.  The younger son works as a school principal.  They started their business by growing a peach orchard.  Alexandr decided to buy drip tape to water his plot, because during the summer draught period it is very difficult to water the orchard manually and to buy a motoblock (hand tractor) to plow his plot.  
Plans for the future: start growing wild strawberries
Personal plans: buy a house for his children
He needs your help to finance drip tape and a motoblock

loans.use: to purchase farm equipment

loans.name: Humaira

texts.en: Ms. Humaira is a 27-year-old married woman. She has been running a shoe-making business. She started her own business to support her family when her husband was the only bread earner at that point in time. With the passage of time her sales have increased and also her income. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. She has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 25,000 to purchase leather, faux leather and spools of thread to increase her sales. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is in her 2nd loan, and she has a good repayment history. She is very thankful to Kashf for their support.

loans.use: to purchase leather, faux leather and spools of thread to use in making shoes.

loans.name: Farhah

texts.en: Ms. Farhah is a 34-year-old married woman. She is a very talented lady and excels in her work of stitching. She has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of their household or the educational needs of children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. She has now requested a loan of PKR. 35,000 to purchase more reels of thread, packs of buttons and laces in various colors. In this way she will be able to meet the increasing demand. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Farhah hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread, packs of buttons and laces in various colors to use in her stitching.

loans.name: Hen

texts.en:
Hen is 56 years old. She is widowed and is a resident of Kratie Province, Cambodia. She has four children and earns her living by selling groceries. Approximately, she makes $10 daily. All of her children are employed. They make an income of $15 each day. 

To improve her family’s finances, Hen is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase more groceries and vegetables to resell. This money will help her increase her stock and generate more profit to support the family. She hopes to expand her business and run an additional business to make more money for the family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries and vegetables to resell

loans.name: Taj

texts.en:
Taj is a 39-year-old, married woman and a mother of five children. For 15 years, Taj has been running a business of milk sales. She initiated her own business by buying a cow to support her family when her husband was the only bread-earner at that point in time. With the passage of time, her sales increased, as did her income. Now, she has one buffalo, too. This has all happened due to her courage and determination.

Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters, as well as financial matters. While talking to the Kashf Foundation officer, she shared the feeling of achievement she got by sending her son to college for further studies. 

She has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is in her fifth loan cycle with Kashf Foundation, with good repayment history. She is very thankful to Kashf Foundation for its support.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Nazeeran

texts.en:
Ms Nazeeran, a 48-year-old dedicated mother of four, has been efficiently selling milk for many years. She currently has two buffalo and one cow, and she also purchases small calves to sell near the Eid-ul-Azha (a religious event in Muslim countries like Pakistan). She earns a good profit from this business.

Because of her work, Nazeeran is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family and financial matters. She has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase another buffalo to increase her milk production capacity. She expects a boost in her business income by catering to more people in her community. Nazeeran is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to increase milk production capacity.

loans.name: Shumaila

texts.en: Ms. Shumaila is a 36-year-old married woman and a mother of three. She is working hard to help her family by providing services of tailoring in her community. She has been doing it for the past three years. She very well knows the techniques of stitching. Ms. Shumaila enjoys a great client list and has gained a lot of appreciation and popularity in her community. In order to meet customers’ demands on time, Ms. Shumaila needs to purchase stitching material in large quantity. For this, she applied for a loan of 30,000 PKR to buy a stock of threads in different colors with the packs of zippers and buttons to meet up with the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy a stock of threads in different colors with the packs of zippers and buttons to meet up with the increasing demand.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El señor Carlos de 54 años de edad, es casado, se dedica al servicio de transporte, realiza fletes dentro del territorio nacional, y su esposa la señora  María se dedica a la producción de leche y  hortalizas, viven en la Ciudad de Villarrica, tienen 2 hijos, uno mayor de edad y otro menor que está estudiando.
El señor Carlos empezó con la actividad siendo chófer de una empresa, con el transcurso del tiempo supo ahorrar y comprar su propio camión de carga mediante el cual genera ingreso para el sustento de cada día de su familia. Carlos solicita este crédito para poder reparar su camión, ya que se acerca la época de zafra de Soja y con eso podrá tener mayores ingresos que poder ofrecer a su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is 54 years old, and he is married.  He provides transportation service within the national territory.  His wife, María, works in milk and vegetable production.  They live in the city of Villarrica.  They have two children.  One is an adult, and the other is a minor, who goes to school. 

Carlos started in this business as a driver for a company.  As time passed, he knew how to save.  He bought his own cargo truck, which he uses to generate income for the daily support of his family.

Carlos is requesting this loan to be able to repair his truck.  The season for harvesting soybeans is getting close, and with this he will be able to have greater income for his family.

loans.use: to repair his truck.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en:
Ms. Nazia is a 32 year-old married woman. Three years ago, she started her own business of used clothing sales. She buys clothes of different designs from the market in bulk at lower rates and sells them in her community. She counts a good client list, most of her clients are her neighbors. She is a mother of two children; both are school-going. She is in charge of providing her family with good food, health and education.

Ms. Nazia has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. Currently she requested a loan of 20,000 PKR to buy a stock of more clothes in different colors and designs by taking into account the demand of her customers. She hopes to have more profits and hence can better support her family.

loans.use: to buy a stock of more clothes in different colors and designs by taking into account the demand of her customers.

loans.name: Aabida

texts.en:
Ms. Aabida is a 47-year-old married woman. She has been running a business of bread making for the past three years. Aabida enjoys making food and has become famous in her town for proving these facilities and makes enough to lead a decent life. She takes orders from nearby hotels and people of her community. 

Aabida is a responsible mother and needs to earn more to bear daily expenditures of her family members. That is why she requested a loan of 20,000 PKR to buy a stock of flour and baking powder with the packs of oil and salt at lower rates from the market. It would enable her to inflate her sales which ultimately helps in generating more cash. Aabida wishes to utilize her earned profit on her children’s education and well-being.

loans.use: to buy a stock of flour and baking powder with the packs of oil and salt at lower rates from the market.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es:
La Sra. Matilde es una persona muy trabajadora, que cuenta que gracias a su esfuerzo ha podido salir adelante, el anterior crédito de kiva le ha sido de mucha ayuda y esta muy agradecida por ello.
Hoy acude nuevamente para poder  surtir su despensa con insumos de primera necesidad, como ser bebidas, gaseosas, comestibles, enlatados y demás, con lo que podrá seguir ofreciendo buena variedad y buen precio a sus clientes.
Agradece nuevamente por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo, ya que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Matilde is a very hard-working person, who explains that thanks to her effort she has been able to get ahead.  The previous Kiva loan has been a big help to her and she is very grateful for it. 

Today, she comes again, to be able to supply her general store with basic staples such as beverages, soft drinks, food products, canned goods and more, with which she will be able to continue offering a good variety and good prices to her clients.  She is again grateful for the opportunity she is receiving because it will help her a lot.

loans.use: to buy beverages, soft drinks, food products, canned goods and more.

loans.name: Kousar

texts.en:
Ms Kousar, a 44-year-old vigorous married mother of three children, all of whom attend school, has been making shoes for many years. She is passionate about her work, and client demand is strong. But business challenges, combined with family expenditures, frustrate her nearly every day. Her husband is employed in a barber shop, but he does not earn enough to support his family well.

In order to consistently meet customer demand, Kousar has requested a loan of Rs 30,000 from Kashf Foundation to purchase good quality leather, plastic leather, and spools of threads and laces. She wishes to spend her earnings on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to purchase good quality leather, plastic leather, and spools of threads and laces.

loans.name: Lise

texts.en:
Lise is an EarthSpark clean energy entrepreneur selling Lanp Enèji Pwòp solar light bulbs and TiPowa solar desk lamps with mobile phone charging on a rent-to-own basis. She lives in Les Cayes, the capital of the South Department of Haiti with her husband and child.
With a Kiva loan, Lise will be set up with a “Business in a Bag”, a kit containing a personalized mix of small-scale clean energy products, marketing materials and training on energy literacy, SMS tracking of sales, and basic business skills.
She currently has 32 customers renting out Lanp Enèji Pwòp and TiPowa, and then; she will soon be expanding her solar entrepreneurship business. Lise is asking for a loan to purchase stock for Lanp Enèji Pwòp and TiPowa because she has a list of customers waiting for them in her area. 
A loan through Kiva will enable her to jump-start her clean energy business.

loans.use: to pay for stock for a clean energy business.

loans.name: Bruno

texts.en:
Bruno lives in Camp-Perrin, Haiti, about a 20-minutes’ drive from Les Cayes. He already has a big store that sells auto and motorcycle parts but is looking to expand his business by becoming an EarthSpark clean energy entrepreneur. He is seeking a loan so that he can be set up with an EarthSpark “Business in a Bag” a kit containing a personalized mix of small-scale clean energy products, marketing materials and training on energy literacy, SMS tracking of sales, and basic business skills. He would like to sell solar desk lamps as well as the Recho Gaz Blan and the Recho Mirak. 
He wants to sell clean energy products because they contribute to protecting the environment in Haiti and minimize the effects of charcoal on the environment by reducing carbon emissions.
He would like to improve access to EarthSpark products and help light up his community.

loans.use: to pay for stock for a clean energy business.

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es: Vicenta de 65 años de edad habita junto a su familia en casa humilde pero propia, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora caracterizada por sus vecinos por ser luchadora que siempre toda su vida ha trabajado para darle un buen bienestar a su familia. Vicenta se dedica a la labor de agricultura es decir con esfuerzo se ha hecho de un pequeño terreno donde cultiva los principales granos básicos de nuestro país que son frijol y arroz, vende cierta parte y otra la deja para consumo propio es así como la clienta se gana la vida decentemente con el esfuerzos de sus manos cada mañana se levanta para tener siempre el pan de cada día en su hogar. Vicenta desea comprar insumos agrícolas pues los que tenía ya se le terminaron y no posee el capital suficiente para comprarlos es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Es una mujer que si tiene dinero paga desde antes que le corresponde la fecha y no duda saldar la cuenta antes de lo previsto agradece a Dios por la oportunidad que le brinda y a las personas de buen corazón que le permitirán realizar su sueño.
texts.en:
Vicenta is sixty-five years old and lives together with her family in a simple home that she owns.  She is a very hard-working woman, characterized by her neighbors as someone who is a fighter and who has worked her whole life in order to ensure the well-being of her family.  

Vicenta makes a living in agriculture and puts all her efforts towards a small plot of land where she grows basic grains of her country, like beans and rice.  She sells a certain amount and leaves the rest to be consumed by her family.  In this way, she has achieved a decent life with her own hands.  Each morning she rises in order to always have food on the table in her home.  

Vicenta hopes to buy agricultural supplies, since she has already run out of them and does not have sufficient capital to buy more.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, and other items.  She is the type of woman that if she has the money, she pays before the necessary date.  She does not doubt that she will pay off the debt ahead of schedule.

She gives thanks to God for the opportunity offered to her and to the people with good hearts who have allowed her to realize her dream.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, and other items.

loans.name: Jalil

texts.en:
Jalil, 43, is a farmer. He lives with his wife and three children who are studying at school. For more than 22 years, he has been doing mixed farming, producing vegetables and milk, which he sells at the local market. In the future, he wants to increase the number of animals, to start raising small livestock, simultaneously with cattle. 

Jalil is requesting a AZN 1,000 loan from VisionFund AzerCredit LLC (VFAC) to purchase seeds and fertilizer. This will help him get more produce and generate extra income that will, in turn, help improve his family's living standards and support the education expenses of his children.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 28-year-old young man. He is married and a father to one son. He lives a simple life with his family in Tulkarem refugee camp.

Mohammad has a fishery, which is the only one of its type in the market. His store is located where there is good customer movement. This makes his project a profitable one and the only source of income to the family, but his business needs more support to cover the costs.

Mohammad is requesting a 3,000 USD Youth Loan from FATEN to cover the costs of purchasing more fish. This will offer to Mohammad a better collection of fish, so his customers will have the ability to choose and buy. It will increase sales and so improve Mohammad's income positively.

Mohammad is photographed in his fishery.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is a 42-year-old woman from Sto. Niño, Tukuran. Susana is married and has four children.

To earn a living, she sells fish, while her husband catches the fish. She has been engaged in her business for three years and typically earns approximately 10,000 PRP per month from these activities.

In 2012, Susana joined GDMPC. Susana is requesting a loan in the amount of 15,000 PHP, which would be used to purchase fishing equipment, including hooks and nets. She plans to use the additional revenue she expects to generate from the business as a result of the loan to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to expand and improve her business by purchasing fishing equipment, including hooks and nets

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
For over five years in Canubay, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental, Catherine, a 33-year-old married mother of one child, has made a living through the operation of a general store. She sells a variety of food and home-use products and earns 20,000 PHP a month from these activities.

Recently, Catherine joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She is now requesting a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase new items such as candies, Milo (malted milk), shampoo, soaps, etc. 

Catherine plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, Milo, shampoo, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Zira

texts.en:
Zira is in her early sixties and has one grown-up child and grandchildren whom she adores. She lives with them in the northern Albania, in a little village and has been operating a vineyard/winery business for the past six years.

Zira sells grapes to the locals who want to make their own wine or she sells her homemade wine to them. Either way, this activity has turned out to be profitable and she has been enjoying it, so far.

This would be the fourth loan, the previous ones being used for the business and successfully paid back. Zira needs this loan to buy pipes and concrete pillars for her vineyard.

loans.use: to buy pipes and concrete pillars for her vineyard.

loans.name: Lhaahuu

texts.en:
Mrs. Lhaahuu is a 61-year-old widow. She lives with her daughter and her two nieces in the Ger in Govi-Altai province of Mongolia. Her daughter, Bolormaa, is 38 years old and used to work in a variety of businesses.

To earn a living, Mrs. Lhaahuu has been producing organic dairy products, which she sells to local customers. She is now planning to start her own retail clothing business at a rental counter in the local market with her daughter. She explains that her daughter has lot of experience in the area. Mrs. Lhaahuu is requesting a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 MNT to purchase some inventory for her new retail clothing business. She notes that she is hardworking and diligent woman.

loans.use: to start a new retail clothing business by purchasing some initial inventory

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is from Sto. Niño, Tukuran. She is 32 years old and married with two children. 

To make a living, Marilyn provides beauty services to local community members. She has been in her business for two years and earns 10,000 PHP a month from these activities. 

This year, Marilyn joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase materials needed to expand the services provided. She hopes to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase materials needed to expand the services provided.

loans.name: Batchuluun

texts.en:
Mr. Batchuluun is a 53-year-old married man. He lives with his wife and son in a small house in the Arhangai province of Mongolia. His wife, Oyungerel, is 50 years old and works from home; specifically, she tailors clothing for her customers at home. His son, Hohoojargal, is 16 years old and studies at a local school.

For 10 years, Mr. Batchuluun has been running a transportation service business in town. His vehicle has been damaged for a while now and it needs some spare parts to get it running again. As a result, he is now requesting a loan in the amount of 500,000 MNT to purchase spare parts for his vehicle and to thereby run his transportation service business more smoothly. He explains that he is a hardworking and diligent man.

loans.use: to improve his transportation business by purchasing spare parts for his vehicle

loans.name: Ariunaa

texts.en:
Mrs. Ariunaa is a 40-year-old woman. She is the head of her house as she lives with her two sons in a small house in the Bayanhongor province of Mongolia. Her oldest son, Olziijargal, is 13 years old and goes to the local secondary school, while her youngest son, Davaajargal, is two years old and goes to the local kindergarten.

Since 2004, Mrs. Ariunaa has been working as a saleswoman at a butcher shop. The owner of the butcher shop is planning on selling the shop, and she is planning to purchase it and to run it as her own business. She is excited and confident about the opportunity because she has a lot of experience with the business and has built close relationships with suppliers and customers over the years. As a result, she is requesting a loan in the amount of 2,500,000 MNT to purchase the butcher shop. She explains that she is a hardworking, diligent and polite person.

loans.use: to purchase the butcher shop at which she works from the current owner

loans.name: Zoje

texts.en:
Zoje is 46 years old and is married to her husband who was born legally blind. Together they have three children; two of them still attend high school. 

Their family lives in the north-west part of Albania. While her husband has been receiving a very small amount of disability assistance, she has been taking care of her family and dairy cows at the same time. "This has been going on for 14 years now and I’ve gotten used to it. The first few years, it was extremely difficult because our children were very young and all in my family needed my care: husband, children and animals,” Zoje said laughing.
 
Zoje is now requesting a loan to expand the existing animal stable.

loans.use: To expand the existing animal stable

loans.name: Elivera

texts.en:
Elivera is 40 years old, married, and has three children who attend public school; they are 18, 16 and 14 years old. 

They live in south-eastern Albania, where she has been operating a flour factory for the past 15 years. She says that she has been able to establish “an excellent relationship” with buyers and sellers. She has been buying the wheat from local farmers and has been selling the flour to bakeries, stores, and local people. The region where she resides is famous for their delicious pies that are considered staple food for them. They use lots of flour to prepare the phyllo.

Elivera is requesting a loan this time of 200,000 ALL to replace her primitive factory equipment with new equipment.

loans.use: To replace her primitive flour factory equipment

loans.name: Gelber  Antonio

texts.es: Gelber habita junto a su familia en casa propia. Él es un hombre que sus vecinos los caracterizan por ser trabajador ya que todas las mañanas lo ven que sale de su casa contento a realizar las labores de cada día, es muy competitivo consigo mismo ya que nunca se ha dejado vencer y a la vez es emprendedor. Él se dedica a la labor de ser agricultor siempre toda su vida lo ha sido y con esfuerzo y dedicación se ha hecho de un pequeño terreno donde cultiva maíz y frijol los principales granos básicos de nuestro país pero aparte también cultiva café. Ya que maneja precios muy accesibles posee clientes quienes lo prefieren y es así como Gelber se gana la vida honradamente. Él desea invertir mas en sus cultivos pero no posee el capital necesario es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para compra de insumos agrícolas como : abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea de todo corazón que el préstamo sea dado para así concretar con éxito las cosechas próximas y seguirá brindándole un mejor hogar a su familia.
texts.en: Gelber lives with his family in their own home. He is a man his neighbors characterize as being hardworking since every morning they see him leave his house happy to being going to work.  He is very competitive with himself as an entrepreneur and has overcome all of his challenges. He has been a farmer his whole life and with a lot of hard work and dedication he has cultivated a small plot of land where he grows corn and beans, the main staples of his country. He also grows coffee. Because he offers affordable prices he has a loyal clientele and this is how Gelber earns an honest living. He wants to invest more in his crops but he doesn't have the capital necessary and it is for this reason that he is requesting a loan with INTEGRAL. He will use the loan to buy agricultural supplies such as compost, fertilizers, pesticides, etc.  He wishes with all his heart that he gets the loan so he can be assured that his next harvest will be a success and he will be able to continue providing his family with a the best home possible.

loans.use: purchase agricultural supplies such as compost, fertilizer, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Im

texts.en:
Im is 68 years old. She is a widow and resides with her son in the Kampong Chhnang Province of Cambodia. Her son is a construction worker, who typically earns approximately $3 per day.

To earn a living, for more than ten years she has been making clay pots, which she sells for profits. By doing so, she typically earns approximately $3 per day.

In order to improve her business, Im is requesting a loan in the amount of $250 to purchase clay and firewood, which would be used to produce more pots to sell. The additional revenue she expects to generate as a result of the loan will help her expand the business and provide more income for the family. In the future, she would like to continue to expand her business.

loans.use: to expand her business by purchasing additional clay and firewood so that she can produce more clay pots

loans.name: Rodamin

texts.es: Rodamin de 30 años de edad, habita junto a su familia su esposa y dos pequeños hijos menores de edad. Se dedica a la agricultura y así lo ha hecho durante toda su vida es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, un padre y esposo ejemplar muy conocido por sus vecinos por ser trabajador y visionario todo por darle un mejor bienestar a su familia. Rodamin desea comprar insumos agrícolas pues los que tenia se le están terminando y no tiene el capital para invertir es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y pesticidas. Espera contar con el crédito solicitado pues desea seguir brindándole un buen futuro a su familia y que estos el dia de mañana sus hijos se lo agradezcan es un hombre muy honesto y espera saldar la deuda antes de lo prevista.
texts.en: Rodamin, who is 30, lives with his family, his wife and his two small sons.  He has worked in agriculture all his life, is very responsible where his household duties are concerned, is an exemplary father and husband and is recognised amongst his neighbours for being hardworking and visionary in striving to enhance his family’s well-being.   Rodamin wants to buy agricultural supplies as he has used all those he had and he does not have any capital to invest.  Therefore, he is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy seeds, manure, fertiliser and pesticides.  He hopes he will be granted the loan he has requested as he wants to continue to provide a good future for his family and give his children something they will be grateful for in the future.  He is a very honest man and he hopes to repay the loan before the end of the term.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertiliser and pesticide

loans.name: Misael Adonay

texts.es: Misael de 48 años de edad vive con su esposa sus hijos. Es un hombre muy trabajador ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por dar y brindar lo mejor para su familia, es honesto, sincero que su mayor sueño y anhelo es que sus hijos siempre viva en condiciones dignas y que en su hogar nunca haga falta el pan de cada día. Actualmente se dedica a la labor de ser agricultor es decir tiene una pequeña cosecha, siembra los principales granos básicos como frijol  y maíz vende cierta parte y lo otro lo deja para su familia, es así como Misael se gana la vida honradamente. El siente la necesidad de mejorar un poco sus cosechas es por esa razón que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para poder así comprar insumos básicos como: Fertilizantes, Pesticidas, Insecticidas, semillas, Abonos entre otros. Él sabe que con eso mejoraran sus ventas y podrá seguirle brindando un buen bienestar a su familia como lo ha hecho hasta el día de hoy.
texts.en:
Forty-eight year old Misael lives with his wife and children.  His is a very hard-working man and has always been known to provide the best for his family.  He is honest and sincere.  His greatest dream and desire are that his children always live in respectable conditions and that his home never lack the daily bread.

He is currently making his living as a farmer.  That is, he has a small crop.  He plants the main staple foods like beans and corn.  He sells part of his crop, and the rest he leaves for his family.  This is how Misael earns his living honorably.

He feels the need to improve his harvests a bit.  It is for this reason that he is applying for a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can buy basic inputs such as:  fertilizers, pesticides, insecticides, seeds and manure, among other things.  He knows that with this, his sales will improve and he will be able to continue providing for his family's well-being, as he has done up until now.

loans.use: to be able to buy basic inputs such as:  fertilizers, pesticides, insecticides, seeds and manure, among others.

loans.name: Federico Enrique

texts.es: Federico de 42 años de edad vive junto a su familia, su esposa y sus hijos. Es un hombre muy trabajador, Honesto, Responsable y sincero sus hijos son su principal fuente de inspiración para superarse y salir adelante, cada mañana se levanta con deseos de brindarles lo mejor cada día, es muy emprendedor ya que es el único que lleva el sustento diario a su hogar y lo que a él más le interesa es que en el futuro a sus hijos nunca les falte nada.  Actualmente Federico posee una pequeña cosecha de granos básicos específicamente de maíz y frijol. El jamás le ha quedado mal a nadie ya que cuenta con buenas referencias de pago, desea incrementar más sus cosechas y es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL  con la confianza de solicitar un crédito y así poder comprar insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, pesticidas, insecticidas, semillas u otros. Confía en Dios que pronto su situación seguirá mejorando con el préstamo solicitado y seguirle brindando buenas condiciones de vida en su hogar.
texts.en:
Federico, who is 42 years old, lives with his family, his wife and his children. He is a hard-working, honest, responsible and sincere man. His children are his main source of inspiration to rise above and continue on; every morning he gets up with the desire to give them the best that he can every day. He is is very entrepreneurial since he is the only one who now brings home daily sustenance. What most interests him is that in the future, his children will never want for anything.

Right now, Federico has a small harvest of basic grains, specifically corn and beans. He has never had any problems with anyone since he can be counted upon for good payment references, and he wishes to increase his harvests even more. This is why he has come to INTEGRAL with the confidence to ask for a loan, and with it he would be able to buy farming supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides, insecticides, seeds, etc. He confides in God that his situation will soon continue to improve with the loan, and will continue to keep providing good living conditions at home.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, such as fertilizers, pesticides, insecticides, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Ramon Calixto

texts.es: Ramón de 65 años de edad, habita en casa de su  propiedad junto con su compañera de vida. Él se dedica a la agricultura, es decir a la siembra de los principales granos básicos como maíz y frijoles, y  aparte posee una pequeña venta de cocos. Se ha dedicado a esta actividad toda su vida y es así como se gana el pan de cada día honradamente. Él es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy conocido en la zona por su enorme corazón y amabilidad con las demás personas. Debido a que la temporada para la siembra se aproxima ha tomado la decisión de comenzar a prepararse para la llegada de esa fecha. Es por esa razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Lo que más desea es que su cosecha sea abundante ya que es la única forma que conoce y hace para lograr tener acceso a una fuente de ingresos.  Confía en Dios que con su ayuda y su arduo trabajo lograr su sueño de lograr mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Sixty-five year old Ramón lives in his own house with his life companion.  He makes his living in agriculture, that is, by sowing the primary staple foods such as corn and beans, and he also has a small coconut sales business.  He has been in this business his whole life, and this is how he earns his daily bread honorably.

He is a hard-working and responsible man, and is well known in the area for his enormous heart and friendliness with other people.

Since the planting season is approaching, he has made the decision to start preparing for the arrival of this date.  This is why he has decided to apply for a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the purchase of seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, etc.  What he wants most is to have an abundant harvest, since it is the only way he knows of to have access to a source of income.  

He trusts in God, that with his help and his hard work, he will achieve his dream of improving the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Vilma Elizabeth

texts.es: Vilma de 39 años vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos. Ella se dedica  a la agricultura de los principales granos básicos como son: maíz y frijol y posee también animales de engorde.  Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora y admirable, no se cansa de realizar esta actividad ya que para ella, lo más importante en la vida es ganarse el pan de cada día dignamente con el trabajo de sus manos, cada vez que termina la cosecha vende cierta parte y otra la deja para el consumo diario . Ha trabajado toda su vida en la agricultura y es así como ha logrado sobrevivir. Como toda mujer emprendedora y visionaria ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a INTEGRAL ya que la fecha para empezar las siembras se aproximan y quiere estar preparada con diversos insumos agrícolas como : semillas, insecticidas, abonos, u otros para comenzar la siembra lo más antes posible y poder cosechar los frutos de su esfuerzo. Confía plenamente que obtendrá una cosecha abundante la cual la cual le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Vilma is 39 years old and lives together with her spouse and her children. She is a farmer of basic grains such as corn and beans, and also has some feeder animals. She is a very enterprising and admirable woman. She never tires of her daily work since, for her, the most important thing in life is to earn her daily bread in a dignified way: working with her hands. Every time a crop comes to harvest, she sells a part of it, and the other part she keeps for her family's daily consumption. 

She has worked all her life in agriculture, and it is in this way that she has been able to survive. Like all enterprising and visionary women, she has made the decision to come to INTEGRAL. The starting date for sowing seeds is growing near and she would like to be prepared with various farming supplies such as seeds, insecticides, fertilizers, etc. so that she can begin as soon as possible and thus be able to harvest the fruits of her labor. She is fully confident that she will obtain a bountiful harvest, which will improve her quality of life and that of her family as well.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies such as seeds, insecticides, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Jhosef Gabriel

texts.es: El Sr. Jhosef tiene 20 años y es soltero el es productor musical tiene su estudio de grabación en su mismo domicilio  que se encuentra en la zona de la ceja de El Alto, este préstamo es su  primera secuencia dentro de la institución, el Sr. Jhosef va a usar este préstamo para la compra de un micrófono que le hace falta ya que su dinero lo invirtió en equipos de sonido,  jhosef enfrenta retos en su negocio que son el encontrar a nuevos talentos, y va a utilizar los beneficios en la compra de equipos que le hacen falta, su deseo es tener un estudio de grabación bien equipado y poder producir a varios artistas.
texts.en:
Jhosef is 20 years old and is single.  He is a music producer.  He has his recording studio in his home, which is located in La Ceja of El Alto.  

This loan is his first with the institution.  Jhosef is going to use this loan to buy a microphone that he needs, since he invested his money in sound equipment.  

In his business, Jhosef encounters challenges such as finding new talent.  He will use his earnings to buy equipment that he needs.  His desire is to have a well-equipped recording studio and to be able to produce various artists.

loans.use: to buy a microphone.

loans.name: Song

texts.en:
Song is a cheerful, good-natured hammock weaver who lives in the Ban Boonyuen Village with her husband, children and extended family.

She is a member of the Mlabri Tribe, a small, peaceful hill-tribe in rural Northern Thailand. The Mlabri were traditionally a hunter-gatherer society, but development and rampant deforestation in the late 20th century decimated their way of life. Denied citizenship by the government and without a sophisticated understanding of the modern world, the Mlabri were quickly forced into indentured servitude and toxic fieldwork by neighboring tribes. Malnourishment and malaria killed many tribe members- they are now listed on UNESCO’s endangered languages list, with less than 300 Mlabri left in the world. 

Hammock weaving is the first economic opportunity that has provided Song and her fellow Mlabri with a foothold toward stability and a brighter future for their children.

Weaving is important to Song because it provides her with a home-based, flexible source of income. She is a dedicated mother and wants to ensure that her children’s schooling is a priority, especially because her children are part of the first generation to go to school-- and she herself was denied had the opportunity to receive a formal education.

With weaving work, she can earn enough to support her family without resorting to laboring in the slash & burn fields- and she can ensure that her children do not have to work in toxic agriculture either. She works on a simple loom in her home, where she can watch her children, nieces and nephews play after school.

For Song and her fellow Mlabri, the extended family is part of the core family unit, so she doesn’t just weave in order to support her own children, but as part of a movement to improve the financial stability and wellbeing of the entire community.

loans.use: to invest in raw materials so she can secure consistent weaving work and increase her income potential.
